performance Once greenlighted, you implement those changes As for content creation you can fall back on the creativity of the Online Wholesale Specialist and our talented inhouse agency, but it is so you always come home with a smile

trend versus demand plan reconciliation, supporting service level protection and offering business analytics and intelligence to business partners to support their strategy

Job Title: Senior Manager, Supply Chain Development [6 months - Fixed Term]
Job Description: Purpose  Overall Relevance For The Organization, , The Senior Manager  Supply Chain Development works across three dimensions to design and implement changes to the supply chain that improve service, optimize flow, minimize waste and enable profitable sales growth Firstly, this team listens to the voice of the customer to deliver shortterm improvements as well as longterm scaleup that benefit the entire customerbase Secondly, they work closely with the wider organization to support new customer relationships and design solutions to best connect the supply chain to that of the customer Thirdly, they investigate emerging trends in the industrylogistics landscape to recommend opportunities which drive innovation within the supply chain

The world of banking is changing faster than ever, enjoy the best experience in our Wholesale Banking traineeship, , During our twoyear programme you create your own career within Wholesale Banking You learn more about your chosen discipline and the financial services sector Our trainee programme also allows you to discover yourself through a wide selection of online professional and personal skills trainings, , , , At ING we are always broadening our horizons Our people have a forwardthinking mentality, a strong cando spirit and enjoy working in an agile environment Do you want to have an impact on not only the financial lives of close to 8 million customers but also on the bank of the future Why wait, discover how today, , Wherever you work in the company, you will be responsible for following developments in the market and establishing a longterm relationship with our customers You therefore have a sense of enterprise and you know what is important to our customers You have a keen desire to optimize our services to serve our clients in their best interest In varying teams of experts, you will continue to make considerable contributions to our Wholesale Banking business, , , , Your trainee manager will assist you in choosing your first rotation which lasts approximately six months Based on your own interests, you can indicate your preferences for your first rotation so that we can work together to find a suitable starting role for you This enables you to get to know several departments within ING You will be involved in the daily activities of Wholesale Banking from day one You will be responsible for fulfilling a concrete assignment, such as working on the present customer portfolios together with the Relationship Manager or on a deal within Corporate Finance, , As a trainee you will also receive guidance from your line manager If you are looking for additional guidance you can ask a Senior Manager to mentor you They will coach you, inspire you, introduce you to their network and share their knowledge and insights with you, , You are in charge of your second assignment Now it comes down to addressing your network and taking the initiative We encourage it to gain international experience during this sixmonth period, which is not only great fun but is also good for your personal and professional development, if possible with if possible with local Covid19 restrictions, , , , Besides being given the opportunity to put your talent to good use where it really matters, youll participate in a global training event with all trainees from your year, which will also enable you to quickly build up a large network, , , , There is more, t o give you an idea, we will tell you about the other benefits of working at ING, , , , , , , When applying for the Wholesale Banking traineeship April 2021, remember to upload your application CV, motivational questions and grade lists Bachelor and Master till now in English if you are sure you are what we are looking for, go for it, , The first interview round HR interview will be scheduled as soon as you pass the three part assessment, , The second interview round Business Panels will be held in the following weeks, , Please note we have a limited amount of traineeship positions per traineeship, so we encourage you to apply as soon as possible, , Click on the following links to find out more about the ITP Programme and the selection procedure , , that the results will remain definite for a future application for one of our traineeships This means that you cannot apply again after not passing either our assessment or interview stage

Who We Are, , Brooks is a team of passionate people united by a desire to do meaningful work, lead healthy lives and make a difference We share a focused mission to inspire everyone to run and be active Thats it No distractionsits all about the run Through science, creativity, service, authenticity and connection, we obsess over delivering the best running gear on the planet We do it our way, with our unique spirit, with a goal of being more relevant to runners than any other brand, day after day and mile after mile We are determined to innovate, challenging ourselves to lead thought at every turn Inside these walls and on the roads, tracks and trails, we live and breathe Run Happy, celebrating the positive impact running has on our lives and others We inject it into all we do because it makes everything better, smarter, more fun and more memorable Our company culture defines us, bonds us together and creates the conditions for success It is lived daily as a behavioral expression of our collective set of brand values Connect with People, Innovate for our Customer, Compete as a Team, Build Trust, Have Fun  Bring Passion, and Be Active If youre on our team, it means youre part of creating something extraordinary Youre part of Brooks, , Your job, , As the Demand Planning Manager at Brooks EMEA you will lead and manage the overall demand planning process for the EMEA region You will have a key role in the development of the 5 years strategic demand plan and the creation of the 24 months operational demand plan at brand and style color level for the growing Brooks EMEA Direct to Consumer, Wholesale and Trade  Distribution businesses, , Functionally, you will collaborate with the Operations and Sales leadership team on setting the Brooks EMEA Demand Planning strategy, to achieve industry leading forecast accuracy and increase service levels and inventory performance for the region Operationally, you will lead the creation of the EMEA operational demand forecasts by closely collaborating with the country Business Planners and country Sales teams You will own the EMEA Sales  Operations Planning Demand Review with Sales, Marketing, Operations and Finance in order to drive forecasting consensus and alignment on market demand, new product introduction and promotional plans for the region, , Your role is also instrumental in controlling portfolio optimization, financial trend versus demand plan reconciliation, supporting service level protection and offering business analytics and intelligence to business partners to support their strategy, , , , , , , , , Estimated start date January 2021, , By submitting this application, you expressly make the following representations and warranties and give your consents as described Job Description, , Ben je een commercieel talent, heb je affiniteit met fashion enof lifestyle en wil je onderdeel zijn van onze wereldwijde groei Dan is dit je kans Bij BALR zijn we op zoek naar een getalenteerde Sales Back Office Representative voor onze Wholesale afdeling, , BALR is in 2013 opgericht door Demy de Zeeuw, Juul Manders en Ralph de Geus Wij zijn in de afgelopen jaren uitgegroeid tot een internationaal lifestylemerk dat bekend staat om onze hoogwaardige mode, reisproducten en accessoires voor mannen, vrouwen n kinderen Genspireerd, gefocust en insync met ons jonge en ambitieuze publiek, brengen wij de luxe levensstijl van de allerbeste atleten binnen handbereik van iedereen die hard werkt om zijn of haar droom te verwezenlijken, , Op ons hoofdkantoor in de Houthaven in Amsterdam werken afdelingen als Wholesale, Retail Finance en ECommerce dagelijks met elkaar samen om het verhaal van BALR te vertellen Inmiddels verkopen wij onze producten in meer dan 150 landen wereldwijd, maar dit is slechts het begin Onze dromen en ambities reiken verder en daarom willen wij de Wholesale afdeling versterken met een Sales Back Office Representative, , Wat ga je doen, , Als Sales Back Office Representative bij BALR ben je d schakel tussen Sales, Logistics, Finance en IT, om samen de Life Of A BALR met de wereld te delen Hoe doe je dat Jij bent de ruggengraat van het Wholesale team bij het realiseren van de omzetdoelstellingen en zorgt ervoor dat de backoffice op orde is Dit houdt in dat je de benodigde informatie zorgvuldig verwerkt in de systemen en proactief communiceert met de betrokken stakeholders Daarnaast ben je first point of contact voor distributeurs, agentschappen en retailers als het gaat om ordermanagement, leveringen en andere relevante onderwerpen Deze rol is d stap om in de toekomst door te groeien naar de positie van International Accountmanager, , Wat zijn jouw verantwoordelijkheden, , , , , , BALR is op zoek naar een commercile aanpakker met veel energie en een getting things done mentaliteit, die staat te springen om de eerste stappen te zetten in zijnhaar salescarrire  Het is belangrijk dat jij je thuis voelt in de snelheid en dynamiek van fashion en lifestyle Je krijgt veel verantwoordelijkheden en bent niet bang om jouw assertiviteit te laten zien, , , Wat kan je van ons verwachten

Just The Job For You, , Accountmanager Vanguard Full Time, , Zin in een down to earth bedrijf waar we jouw sales skills goed kunnen gebruiken, Weve just got the job for you, , JOUW WERKDAG, Samen beter worden met aandacht en interesse voor de klant is een rode draad bij Just Brands, maar als Accountmanager Vanguard is echt letterlijk geen dag hetzelfde In het meest inspirerende pand van Amsterdam en omstreken loop je elke ochtend met een versgemalen bonenkoffie naar de showroom van Vanguard Je start de dag op met het beantwoorden van emails van jouw klanten, ondertussen plan je een inkoopafspraak en plan je een bezoek naar de winkel om te kijken of de collectie er goed bij hangt Je analyseert dagelijks de resultaten en maakt strategische plannen om samen met jou klanten het beste uit Vanguard te halen, JOUW VERANTWOORDELIJKHEID, Als Accountmanager Vanguard ben je verantwoordelijk voor alle Wholesale activiteiten in jouw rayon Je ontvangt een aantal keren per jaar jouw klanten in de showroom om de collectie van Vanguard te presenteren Je bent doortastend, je speelt in op de behoeftes van jouw klant en draagt de verantwoordelijkheid om een partnership aan te gaan Je houdt de markt scherp in de gaten van nieuwe ontwikkelingen, zoekt naar nieuwe mogelijkheden om Vanguard uit te breiden en maakt maandelijks rapportages van jouw bevindingen, ONZE VERANTWOORDELIJKHEID, Als het gaat om responsibility kiest Just Brands, samen met jou, zelfbewust voor maatschappelijk verantwoord ondernemen Onder andere door samen te werken met schone fabrieken die Company Overview, , Altenex Energy, a subsidiary of US company Edison Energy, is an independent advisor for commercial, industrial, and institutional energy users, delivering datadriven and integrated energy solutions in Europe This includes providing comprehensive renewable energy advisory and procurement services focused on analyzing and mitigating risk, while improving sustainability within each clients energy portfolio, , Empowering organizations to manage the key challenges of cost, carbon, and complex choices, the Altenex team helps clients design energy and sustainability strategies, find the optimal renewable energy projects and products, structure contract terms that minimize risk, and manage growing renewables portfolios in unison with traditional power supply, , Altenex Energy and Edison Energy are wholly owned subsidiaries of Edison International NYSE EIX, , For more information, please visit wwwaltenexenergycom, , , , The Client Service s team is responsible for managing the client relationship throughout the lifecycle of a renewable energy engagement The team works as a partner to the clients internal energy and sustainability teams  analyzing the clients electricity portfolio to understand how new contracts would interact with the existing energy strategy and load, educating stakeholders and senior executives, developing a cohesive renewable energy strategy and project plan, coordinating internally to execute on the project plan, using analytics to evaluate the most favorable project selection and identify key risks, and leading commercial discussions as well as executive approvals of a definitive agreement The Client Service s Manager is responsible for delivering this high  quality advisory service to clients

to deliver the strategic direction and management of the high growth of the region The role will manage a team of Site Acquisition Managers, as well as providing provide support to all leasing activities, by helping with strategic purchasing opportunities, contract amendments, completion of post leasecontract paperwork and ownership of contract expansions in stabilized markets, , , , , , , , The candidate must also be able to converse with finance, operations, security, and networking representatives to prepare business cases and deal summaries  and present those to senior staff for approval, prior to routing executable documents, , Ability to meet Microsoft, customer andor government security screening requirements are required for this role These requirements include, but are not limited to, the following specialized security screenings Microsoft Cloud Background Check This position will be required to pass the Microsoft Cloud background check upon hiretransfer and every two years thereafter, , COICareers, , Microsoft is an equal opportunity employer All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to age, ancestry, color, family or Wat ga je doen, , , Onze afdeling Category Manager Onderdelen in Leusden is verantwoordelijk voor het hele assortiment onderdelen voor Volkswagen, Audi, KODA, SEAT en Volkswagen Bedrijfswagens in Nederland Als Category Manager krijg jij enkele productcategorien en n of meer van deze merken onder je hoede, , Je krijgt te maken met veel stakeholders fabrikanten, leveranciers, dealers, logistiek en support collegas Jouw energie en flexibiliteit zorgen dat je snel en makkelijk schakelt tussen al deze stakeholders, culturen en situaties Het is bovenal een commercile rol je analyseert de omzet en marge, en zet dit om in acties om deze te optimaliseren en stakeholders te adviseren, , Je beheert een eigen category onderdelen en wordt verantwoordelijk voor pricing, marge, verkoop en managen van de leveranciers, logistiek en interne stakeholders Dat betekent dat je kansen in de markt verkent en vervolgens de strategie bepaalt om onze onderdelen in de markt te zetten Je zorgt voor de samenstelling, benchmarking, pricing, beschikbaarheid en de ontwikkeling van je productgroepen Je bent een belangrijke schakel tussen de fabriek en de merken over de onderdelen waar jij verantwoordelijk voor bent, , Daarnaast heb je de verantwoordelijkheid over de reparatie en onderhoud proposities van je merk Hierin werk je nauw samen met de Service Marketeer en werken jullie samen aan de juiste invulling van de strategie, , , , Net als wij vind je een goede sfeer in het team erg belangrijk en heb je een voorliefde voor autos Vanuit die basis werk je graag samen met ons aan de toekomst Ook ben je ondernemend, vernieuwend en ken je de markt Dankzij jouw grote analytische vermogen weet je analyses slim te vertalen naar concrete kansen Je bent kwaliteitsgericht en sensitief voor de verschillende belangen die spelen in de dealerorganisatie Je kan snel schakelen tussen verschillende situaties, waarbij jouw positieve energie en flexibiliteit goed van pas komen Daarnaast ben je commercieel en denk je verder dan alleen inkoop en assortiment, , , , We hopen dat je per 1 januari 2021 kan starten, , , , Onze afdeling bestaat uit een team van 12 enthousiaste collegas Dit zijn je collegas van de afdeling Category Management Onderdelen, maar ook Category Management Accessoires en support medewerkers Dit complete team zorgt dagelijks voor de juiste producten en service naar ons dealernetwerk

Under Armour has one mission to make you better We have a commitment to innovation that lies at the heart of everything we do, not just for our athletes but also for our teammates As a global organization, our teams around the world push boundaries and think beyond what is expected Together our teammates are unified by our values and are grounded in our vision to inspire you with performance solutions you never knew you needed but cant imagine living without, , , , Pricing is a key driver of Under Armours future profitability and success, , As the EMEA ITP Lead, you will play a pivotal role on the pricing team at Under Armour This role will own the analysis  decision making of all pricing and promotional activity across the region They will work xfunctionally to understand the pricing competitive set, financial KPIs, and promotional expectations to build long term strategies supported by analytics to ensure we are executing towards our 5YP, , Key Accountabilities and Scope of Role, , Drive the initial ticket pricing approach and model development for the EMEA region, proactively delivering factbased pricing recommendations to teams, , Work sidebyside with divisional merchandising team to influence initial ticket pricing during the gotomarket process, , Evolve key pricing models including exploring ways to streamline data inputs, provide recommendations, and visualize outputs, , Ensure key pricing objectives are met in UAs gotomarket process and help to drive conversation of pricing at milestone meetings, including overall pricing strategy by category with global alignment, , Coordinate and communicate with finance any approved price changes, , Coordinate and align with Sales Operations on price flow between Trasix and FMS, , Own  coordinate pricing matrix for all 16 pricing matrixs across the region to ensure they are relevant  updated biannually, , Promotional analysis for wholesale and DTC to ensure ROI on planned promotional timeframes with fact based recommendations on timing, duration,  content of promotions for future seasons, , Core Capabilities, , Responsible to learn from the Global pricing model and adapt and implement a relevant approach for EMEA market, , They will also be responsible for implementing and executing operational plans across the region to drive a cohesive pricing strategy, , This role will require a high level of supervision due to the newness of the role  minimal global process, , Main point of verbal and written communication will be across the below business leaders, , Daily communication to outline and implement ways of working and processes to build scalable approach to pricing across the region, , weeklymonthly communication to understand historical and future impacts ITP decisions, , Monthly to help understand overall pricing strategies across key areas of the business and to educate on analytical ouput, , Monthly communication to understand the impacts of sellthru on ITP decisisions and to gain appropriate content for promotional analysis, , Knowledge and Experience, , NA, , , , Paid UA Give Back Volunteer Days work alongside your team to support initiatives in your local community, , Under Armour merchandise  Connected Fitness app discounts  including MyFitnessPal  MapMyFitness, , Maternity and Parental Leave for eligible and FMLAeligible teammates, , Health  fitness benefits, discounts and resources We offer teammates across the country programs to promotephysical activity and overall wellbeing, , At Under Armour, we are committed to providing an environment of mutual respect where equal employment opportunities are available to all applicants and teammates without regard to race, color, religion, sex, pregnancy including childbirth, lactation and related medical conditions, national origin, age, physical and mental disability, marital status, sexual orientation, gender identity, gender expression, genetic information including characteristics and testing, military and veteran status, and any other characteristic protected by applicable law, , Under Armour believes that diversity and inclusion among our teammates is critical to our success as a global company, and we seek to recruit, develop and retain the most talented people from a diverse candidate pool

Job Description, , BALR is on the lookout for an ERP Administrator Do you have an interest in fashionlifestyle and would you like to play a key role in reaching the full potential of our brand Check out this position, , BALR is an international luxury lifestyle brand known for its highend fashion, travel products and accessories for men, women and kids As an Amsterdambased brand we have created a complete range of highquality items that inspire to live the life of a BALR Founded in 2013 by Demy de Zeeuw, Juul Manders and Ralph de Geus, BALR is the embodiment of a modern lifestyle brand Aspirational, focused and insync with its young and ambitious audience, we bring the luxurious lifestyle of extraordinary athletes within arms reach of everyone who works hard to live the dream, , , , As ERP Administrator at BALR you are part of the IT department and responsible for mapping out all workflows of the company Your purpose is to integrate these workflows in our ERP system, in this case Netsuite In this important role, youll be partnering with your IT colleagues, as well as departments such as Ecommerce, Wholesale, Retail and Design  Product Development With your expertise and focus, youll propose and implement process improvements, , , , , , , , At BALR we are looking for an analytical and proactive ERP Administrator With your data driven mindset and analytical skills youll act as an advisor for the business Its important you feel comfortable in a fast paced fashion and lifestyle environment Therefore, an interest in fashion and lifestyle product is a plus, , , , Are you up for the challenge

We are looking for a commercial Strategic Accounts Director with a love for fashion, , Strategic Accounts Director, , As our Strategic Accounts Director, youll be commercially responsible for our 2 strategic online accounts Zalando  Amazon The overarching goal is to build strong relationships with our partners, to grow the accounts across all the business models, whilst driving common goals and encouraging a common set of values, , You will also be responsible to support all online Partner Programs such as About You, eBay, La Redoute, and Spartoo, This requires forecasting and driving all revenue and margin KPIs, performance trends, and volumes across both wholesale, partner programs, and other account initiatives, As we continue to grow our business with them, you will be key to the success of our online strategy, focusing on margin drivers, omnichannel customer experience, assortment, programmatic investments as well as support to the cooperative Brand campaigns, , You will be the key driver of harmonizing the assortment between our accounts, as well as optimizing seasonal and special buys Key focus maintaining wholesale future orders and maximizing in season reorders You will be responsible for owning the trade and promotional calendar, in very close cooperation with the online and brand marketing team, setting their targets, KPIs and guiding the teams to achieve this, , For the commercial collection and buying process, you are working together with the digital merchandiser and buyer to deliver the right process and continually optimize stock position for the digital PL, , As a manager, you will inspire the teams to think dynamically and innovatively as we grow with our partners Not only will we focus on sales, but also our common set of values such as diversity, inclusion, and sustainability, , We want to focus our business relationship on decisions that encourage an evolving set of core customer principles in these key topics This is an exciting time to help shape that strategy between us and our partners, , This role also acts as a guiding force across our other marketplace and online relationships, helping our colleagues in market work to similar standards and metrics You will continue to evolve our online strategic accounts strategy across our global portfolio, , In short, this is a very interesting next step in the ecommerce world, , Tasks and Responsibilities, , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , Beyond a competitive salary, working at GStar brings many other perks and exciting opportunities an awesome and diverse team that collaborates to change the game a work environment that offers room for fun, inspiration, and innovation a clothing budget a healthy, fresh and delicious lunch and even discounts in various fitness clubs and last but not least, a discount on a new bicycle

The Team, , Based In The Amsterdam European Head Office The Team The MSW Division Consists Of The Following Teams, , The Tommy Hilfiger Menswear division is one of the main business drivers within Tommy Hilfiger Europe, , , , , As a Jersey designer working in the Menswear Division you will be part of the CS design team for designing and executing seasonal collections for the product category lightweight jerseys and mainly polos You will work closely with a Senior designer in the team, the developers from the development team, merchandise team, and the Design Director for the planning and development of the collection each season You will design and execute seasonal range plans for review by the Design Director, , , , , , , , To be successful in this position you need to have a good understanding of the latest Jersey trends and the ability to translate them into a commercial product It is important that you are able to work independently as well as in a team and that you also enjoy working in a busy, changeable environment To be able to work well with other teams you need to have strong communicational skills, , , , , NOTE This job description is not intended to be allinclusive Employee may perform other related duties as negotiated to meet the ongoing needs of the organization

Everyone Comfortable in Their Own Shoes, , Crocs, Inc NASDAQ CROX is a world leader in innovative casual footwear for men, women and children with more than 1 billion in annual revenue The company offers several distinct shoe collections with more than 300 fourseason footwear styles All Crocs shoes feature Croslite material, a proprietary, revolutionary technology that gives each pair of shoes the soft, comfortable, lightweight, nonmarking and odorresistant qualities that Crocs wearers know and love Crocs fans Get Crocs Inside every pair of shoes, from the iconic clog to new sneakers, sandals, boots and heels Since its inception in 2002, Crocs has sold more than 200 million pairs of shoes in more than 90 countries around the world, , Our EMEA brand support center in is looking for a In this role you will be responsible of executing the digital marketing operations in order to optimize and increase Crocs presence in the Etail and Marketplace landscape You will be closely working with the eTail  Marketplace Team and Sr Digital Marketing manager, as well as the Crocs EU Digital Marketing Team To succeed in this position you should be very analytical, have good time management skills and be good at prioritizing tasks, , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , Is this the job youre looking for Please apply We would like to meet you

Global Capital Markets GCM team in Amsterdam or London based As part of the team you will be responsible to steer rating advisory for INGs large Financial Institutions FI clients You will support FI clients and various ING teams by providing rating and capital analysis on bank and insurance companies for instance in case of MA opportunities and the issuance of capital instruments In case of a mandate, you will lead a rating process Furthermore you will coordinate and prepare regular rating updates and tailormade rating advice Based in Amsterdam or London, you will closely collaborate with colleagues in GCM, FI Advisory and Corporate Rating Advisory as well as FI coverage bankers Primary focus would be on EMEA clients, however also Americas and Asian teams could be supported Next to rating agency topics you will advise on bank and insurance regulation, the capital structure and capital instruments for FIs As sustainability ratings becomes more and more important, certain affinity is a virtue, , , , , , A job from 36 to 40 hours and a unique offer that fits in with the times of today We take into account your home situation and your ambitions and help you to balance work and private life Discover yourself our employment conditions , , , , Contact the recruiter attached to the advertisement for more information Want to apply directly Please upload your CV and motivation letter by clicking the Apply button, , Please note, multiple interview steps involving various business stakeholders will be part of the selection process, , , , INGs purpose is Empowering people to stay a step ahead in life and in business Every ING colleague contributes to that vision We champion selfreliance and foster a collaborative and innovative culture The Orange Code is our global manifesto for how we stay true to our purpose and our tradition of reinvention and empowerment It is made up of ING Values we are honest we are prudent we are responsible and ING Behaviours you take it on and make it happen you help others to be successful you are always a step ahead, , For us, success will only be achieved if we act with Integrity

to join Rabobank as a Global Transaction Officer and to make a difference to yourself, our customers and to society We look forward to receiving your application for this vacancy in Utrecht, , Good to Online Marketeer Social Media  Email  Euretco Fashion Europe Ben jij op de hoogte van de laatste modetrends, zit fashion in je bloed Weet je hoe je online door middel van Social Media op de juiste plek met de juiste content aanwezig bent Heb je ervaring met het versturen van relevante nieuwsbrieven Dan zijn wij op zoek naar jou Wij zoeken een jong talent waarbij fashion de dagelijkse way of living is en die in staat is onze diensten online op een creatieve manier over de bhne te brengen Wat ga je doen Als Online Marketeer binnen de afdeling Marketing Fashion Europe, functioneer je als Social Media en Email specialist voor de Nederlandse markt Samen met andere marketingspecialisten ben je verantwoordelijk voor de online naamsbekendheid van ons nieuwe servicemodel en alle diensten en producten die we onze ondernemers bieden Je bent dagelijks bezig met online platformen als Instagram, Facebook en LinkedIn, zowel organisch als betaald en zowel B2B als B2C Je bent onder andere aanspreekpunt voor onze interne klanten en de consumenten die via Social Media aan ons verbonden zijn Je werkt nauw samen met collegas in Duitsland Je bent in staat zelfstandig een marketingplan op te stellen en uit te voeren Je rapporteert aan de Manager Marketing Fashion Europe Functieeisen Als Online Marketeer bij Euretco Fashion voldoe je aan de volgende eisen

Bel Impex BV is op zoek naar een gemotiveerde sales collega, die het team komt versterken met alle commercile zaken op zowel in als verkoopgebied vanuit de binnendienst als aan tafel bij de klant of leverancier Bel Impex BV is sinds 1992 een succesvol importbedrijf voor exotische producten zoals groente, specerijen en fruit Wij werken vanuit een modern bedrijfspand in Nootdorp, met eigen magazijn Door onze focus op kwaliteit en service werken we al vele jaren samen met vaste leveranciers en klanten Wij zijn een platte organisatie, die in staat is snel te reageren op ontwikkelingen in de markt en bij onze leveranciers en klanten Om de groei van ons bedrijf te versnellen zoeken we een accountmanager die zich thuis voelt binnen een kleine, wendbare organisatie Je vindt het een uitdaging om nieuwe paden te verkennen en je met alle facetten van commercie, voornamelijk new business, maar ook relatiebeheer te houden Ook inkoop hoort hierbij en dit biedt je de kans om je met product management bezig te zijn en daarmee direct verantwoordelijk te worden voor je eigen commercile resultaten Een brede orintatie dus voor een energieke zelfstarter De functie van sales accountmanager

We are looking for a Deal Execution Officer location Amsterdam, , Lending Deal Execution is responsible to fully understand complex loan documentation and capture the agreements in our systems ensuring limits, collateral and financial covenants are captured correctly, , Lending Deal Execution is part of INGs global COO Lending organisation And is responsible for a wide range of midoffice Wholesale Lending related activities These include bilateral and syndicated credit facilities between Domestic andor Foreign Clients and ING during the entire lifecycle of such credit facility, , Deal Execution advises on operational feasibility, execution and monitoring of such credit agreements in the Wholesale Lending applications according to the legally agreed terms and conditions and applicable Banks and regulatory standards, , At our Amsterdam office, we have six Deal Execution teams who use Agile and Lean methodologies to further improve the client experience, the way we work and how we collaborate Our purpose is to be best in class in Lending Deal Execution services and meet agreed Service Levels with our Customers by collaborating within and across departments and teams and a drive to improve processes Teams are motivated and supported to become more and more autonomous and selforganising Diversity and Inclusion is important to us, , Main responsibilities, , , , Who are we looking for, , , , A job from 32 to 40 hours and a unique offer that fits in with the times of today We take into account your home situation and your ambitions and help you to balance work and private life Discover yourself our employment conditions, , To give you an idea, we will tell you about the benefits of working at ING

Het team Ordermanagement is verantwoordelijk om elke klantopdracht vanaf het moment dat de opdracht getekend ontvangen is tot oplevering te laten komen Je ontvangt vanuit de salesteams een overdracht van een order met de behoefte van de opdrachtgever en zorgt er voor dat alle afdelingen die nodig zijn voor de gevraagde netwerkoplossingen hun deelopdracht ontvangen Dit betekent dat je cordineert of alle noodzakelijke randvoorwaarden aanwezig zijn, je schakelt tussen bijvoorbeeld de afdelingen Sales, Inkoop, en Netwerk Engineering en je monitort of de order goed en op tijd wordt geleverd Dit om uiteindelijk de bestelde netwerkoplossing aan de klant op te kunnen leveren binnen de gestelde termijn en conform klantwens Op het moment dat de netwerkoplossing wordt opgeleverd, start je het facturatieproces, , Tijdens dit uitvoeringsproces ben jij het directe aanspreekpunt voor de klant en houd je hem periodiek en proactief op de hoogte van de voortgang Intern bewaak je tijdslijnen en verwachtingen en je escaleert indien nodig bij de betreffende teamverantwoordelijken Ordermanagement is verantwoordelijk voor alle type klantopdrachten, varirend van relatief standaard verbindingen voor Wholesale partijen en partners tot netwerkoplossingen met meerdere verbindingen voor directe klanten, netwerkkennis of overzicht van het Telecom netwerk is zeker handig

Work environment, , The COO Risk  Finance department delivers Risk  Finance related services to its stakeholders, ie Group Finance, country CFOs and Wholesale Banking, Risk, Tax and Bank Treasury These services encompass operations and change initiatives for accounting, reporting, data foundation and business advice services, including system, process, data and information management, and analytics capabilities By design, the services are reliable, secure and in control Change is delivered in accordance with the Finance strategy and implementation and decommissioning roadmap, , The Tribe Statutory and Regulatory Reporting delivers and enables the organisation to provide ontime, highquality, standardized financial reporting solutions, in compliance with external and internal regulations, , As a BA, you work in a squad with around 79 colleagues covering the whole range of expertise in the squad Together, you work on a common purpose You like to work in a constructive way in a multidisciplinary squad Together with your squad members you do everything within your power to realise your common mission day by day, , The BA reports to the Chapter Lead The BA can fulfil the role of Product Owner within a squad, determining the priorities for the squad, , , , We are looking for an energetic and driven expert with strong analytical capabilities who uses stateoftheart methods and techniques for business analysis You have integral, domainexceeding knowledge of Finance, , You are an excellent communicator and able to build bridges between different stakeholders You are able to convincingly put forward your proposals and are a real team player in reaching broad agreement on the road to follow In this way, you can contribute to delivering standardised, uniform and fully adapted solutions to complex Finance issues and processes, , You analyse complex Finance business issues that go beyond squad andor tribe boundaries, with a view to designing complete solutions for the requested change You deliver excellently substantiated analyses using stateoftheart techniques and tools, which lead to functional designs that cover all change deliverables You are focused on process design and the translation to IT You ensure that all requirements of all relevant stakeholders are acknowledged in the analyses and the different solution designs You support tribes and squads in their decisionmaking by presenting the different functional and solution design alternatives and their impact in a clear way You guarantee that the business requirements and nonfunctional requirements are translated into IT Solution requirements You work together with IT architects and specialists to come up with a suitable IT solution, , , , , , You elicit sets of coherent requirements You make sure that the requirements are complete, consistent, of good quality, that they are translated correctly in the design, and that they are maintained and, if necessary, adjusted if changes occur You support the product owners and the squads in managing the backlog by translating and prioritising the epics into features and, together with the squad, into user stories, , , , You analyse the current situation, the problems that occur and the underlying causes Based on this analysis, you provide clear process designs, , , , You analyse the necessary input, output, and adjustment of data in the client processes You analyse the information need You investigate the quality of the captured data and come up with solutions to improve quality, , , , You are able to translate the policy and regulation of ORM, Compliance and Legal into design solutions, , , , , , , , , , , , A job for 36 hours and a unique offer that fits in with the times of today We take into account your home situation and your ambitions and help you to balance work and private life Discover yourself our employment conditions, To give you an idea, we will tell you about the benefits of working at ING, , , , Want to apply directly Please upload your letter by clicking the Apply button We are looking forward to meeting you, , , , The ING Group is a Dutch multinational banking and financial services corporation headquartered in Amsterdam, operating in over 40 countries INGs purpose is to empower people to stay a step ahead in life and in business ING prides itself as a frontrunner in digital and sustainability innovations amongst financial instructions With around 52,000 employees and operations in approximately 40 countries, there is no shortage of opportunities for people with initiative who want to make a difference We hire smart people like you for your potential, not your past Our biggest expectation is that youll stay curious Keep learning Take on more responsibility In return, well back you to develop into an even more awesome version of yourself If you want to work at the cutting edge of whats possible, surrounded by progressive, inspiring and supportive colleagues, there is no better place to invest your talents than at ING

Stel je eens voor, Stel je eens voor dat jij als Quality Assurance QA Specialist samen met de QA Lead het QA framework onder de loep neemt en een belangrijke bijdrage levert aan het beheersbaar houden van AML risicos verbonden aan de financile dienstverlening Een verantwoordelijkheid met impact die je vormgeeft door een scherp oog voor kwaliteitsverbetering te hebben, inzichtelijk te maken op welke manier dit kan gebeuren en hier opvolging aan geeft Dit doe je op basis van vakinhoudelijke kennis op het gebied van witwassen en voorkoming van terrorismefinanciering, een handson mentaliteit en het actief opzoeken van samenwerking met stakeholders, , De QA Specialist ontvangt hirarchisch leiding van de QA Lead binnen de afdeling Transaction Monitoring TM, , , , , , , Samenwerken is de manier Job Title: Specialist Transaction Monitoring Policy and Risk coverage
Job Description: We are looking for an experienced financial crime professional with international experience in financial services You are a transaction Monitoring specialist, Subject Matter Expert SME and trusted advisor within the Financial Crime Compliance environment providing world class Transaction Monitoring for a Global Bank As a Senior SME TM Policy  Risk coverage you will be based in and report hierarchically and functionally to the Global lead of the Policy  Risk Coverage team, , , , , , , , , The Global KYC organisation is part of INGs COO domain Its purpose is Enabling people and organisations to use our banking services by ensuring a compliant and competitive KYC ecosystem, , Our Global KYC organisation is a first line of defence department providing the ING business and functions with guidance, standardised solutions in the area of KYCrelated regulations as well as supporting realising operational excellence In our Global KYC organisation you will be working with many colleagues from different disciplines, geographies and backgrounds You will be part of managing and supporting the transformation towards this global organisation and as such contribute significantly to the realisation of the One Agile Way of Working methodology within ING, , The Global Transaction Monitoring TM organization TM Pillar is part of the Global KYC organization It sets standards and provides content expertise on the implementation of various KYCrelated laws  policies to the squads or circles, ensures the alignment with the other lines of defence and represents KYC and ING to internal  external parties incl regulators and client events The TM pillar, together with the local TM experts, plays a vital role in ensuring effective and efficient compliance with the KYCrelated regulations, more specific the AMLCTF legislation, , Within the TM Pillar, we have dedicated teams with indepth KYC knowledge and expertise one of the teams is the Policy  Risk Coverage team This team works closely with Compliance on our KYC Policy and is responsible for setting the requirements for transaction monitoring scenarios and controls for our global banking products and services, including reviewing country specific scenarios and controls It is our responsibility to monitor globally proper risk coverage and report hereon, , , , , , , With around 52,000 employees and operations in approximately 40 countries, there is no shortage of opportunities for people with initiative who want to make a dierence We hire smart people like you for your potential, not your past Our biggest expectation is that youll stay curious Keep learning Take on more responsibility In return, well back you to develop into an even more awesome version of yourself, , If you want to work at the cutting edge of whats possible, surrounded by progressive, inspiring and supportive colleagues, there is no better place to invest your talents than at ING Join us Apply today

Job Description, , The Art Director is involved in all aspects of how the brand expresses itself visually This includes product design, sample imagery, packaging, identity development, social media, trade marketing, campaign conceptionexecution, ecommerce, email marketing, trade marketing and exhibitions The AD should have a desire to create cuttingedge visual work, and engaged in and inspired by the cultural and artistic heritage of Polaroid, , , , , , , , , , This is a fulltime role based in our Amsterdam HQ You will be reporting directly to the Creative Director and working closely across the marketing and product teams

Job Description, , Your job, , You Will Be Responsible For, , As the Enterprise Marketer you will enlarge the footprint of Sana Commerce in the enterprise segment This is done by drafting and executing a global enterprise marketing strategy which is tailored towards a selected account list of Manufacturing, Distribution and Wholesale companies selling products and using Microsoft Dynamics and or SAP As this role is new to the company you will be responsible for both to setup as the execution with help of the corporate team of a successful global marketing program which enables Sana to accelerate brand awareness, though leadership, revenue and advocacy in mainly North America, UK  Ireland, DACH, BeNeLux and the APAC This will make you the gotoperson for the global commercial organization on Enterprise Marketing, , , , , , , , , , It all started in 2007, with a pizza and a plan One evening in Rotterdam, the Netherlands, five people came together over a pizza and set out to create a B2B ecommerce platform unlike any other And Sana Commerce was born, , Sana Commerce is an ecommerce platform designed to help manufacturers, distributors and wholesalers succeed by fostering lasting relationships with customers who depend on them How By making our customers SAP or Microsoft Dynamics ERP and ecommerce work as one This unlocks total customer convenience, reliability without compromise, and constant evolution, , Sana Commerce is currently powered by more than 400 employees We all have our own expertise and specialties, from sales and marketing to project management and more But were all driven by the same goal to make our customers ecommerce projects a success, , , , So, what does being a part of the Sana team mean Below is a list of our core values  the most important beliefs we look for in new colleagues and the foundation of our company culture They guide us in our decision making and they define Sanas personality as an organization

The world of banking is changing faster than ever, enjoy the best experience in our Risk Management traineeship, , During our twoyear programme you create your own career within Risk You learn more about your chosen discipline and the financial services sector Our trainee programme also allows you to discover yourself through a wide selection of online professional and personal skills trainings, , , , , At ING we are always broadening our horizons Our people have a forwardthinking mentality, a strong cando spirit and enjoy working in an agile environment Do you want to have an impact on not only the financial lives of close to 8 million customers but also on the bank of the future Why wait, discover how today, , Above all, change banking means taking action The financial world is currently facing many changes and as a Risk Management trainee you play an important role in tackling them The findings from the analysis you perform, mainly on behalf of Retail and Wholesale Banking, will influence our company results and the risks we are prepared to take Therefore, you need to have a strong sense of selfbelief and stand behind your decisions, , , , Your trainee manager will assist you in choosing your first rotation which lasts approximately six months During your rotation you are set to work on projects related to Credit  Trading Risk, Balance Sheet Risk, Risk Services, Compliance, Operation Risk Management or Regulatory You are handed a lot of responsibility within your role right from day one, , As a trainee you will also receive guidance from your line manager If you are looking for additional guidance you can ask a Senior Manager to mentor you They will coach you, inspire you, introduce you to their network and share their knowledge and insights with you, , You are in charge of your second assignment Now it comes down to addressing your network and taking the initiative We encourage it to gain international experience during this sixmonth period, which is not only great fun but is also good for your personal and professional development, if possible with if possible with local Covid19 restrictions, , , , Besides being given the opportunity to put your talent to good use where it really matters, youll participate in a global training event with all trainees from your year, which will also enable you to quickly build up a large network, , , , There is more, t o give you an idea, we will tell you about the other benefits of working at ING, , , , , , When applying for the Risk traineeship April 2021, remember to upload your application CV, motivational questions and grade lists Bachelor and Master till now in English if you are sure you are what we are looking for, go for it, , The first interview round HR interview will be scheduled as soon as you pass the three part assessment, , The second interview round Business Panels will be held in the following weeks, , Please note we have a limited amount of traineeship positions per traineeship, so we encourage you to apply as soon as possible, , Click on the following links to find out more about the ITP Programme and the selection procedure , , that the results will remain Job Title: Global KYC CDD Sr. Operations Specialist
Job Description: As Global KYC CDD Sr Operations Specialist you will be based in Warsaw, Bratislava or Manila preferable but other locations can be discussed You will report into the Expert Lead CDD Operations in Adam, , What You Will Do, , , , , , , , , , The Global KYC organisation is a new organisation within the COO domain Its purpose is Enabling people and organisations to use our banking services by ensuring a compliant and competitive KYC ecosystem Bringing all KYC related capabilities into one functionally steered organisation will support the standardisation of related processes, enhanced controls, shared tooling and the optimisation of operations across all of the business lines, helping us to achieve a more robust KYC environment that will strongly contribute to INGs overall response towards more stringent regulatory requirements in this area and beyond, The Global KYC organisation is a first line of defence department providing the ING business and functions with guidance, standardised solutions in the area of KYCrelated regulations as well as supporting realising operational excellence In the Global KYC organisation you will be working with many colleagues from different disciplines, geographies and backgrounds You will be part of managing and supporting the transformation towards this global organisation and as such contribute significantly to the realisation of the One Agile Way of Working methodology within ING, , If you want to work at the cutting edge of whats possible, surrounded by progressive, inspiring and supportive colleagues, there is no better place to invest your talents than at ING Join us Apply today

building a leading fashion and techforward accessories company, , , We are looking for a proven HR business partner to join our BeNelux team based in our new Amsterdam office  This is a dynamic role Job Title: Senior FI Capital & Ratings Advisory specialist within Global Capital Markets
Job Description: Senior FI Capital  Ratings Advisory specialist within Global Capital Markets, , ING Wholesale Banking WB is looking to hire a Senior FI Capital  Rating Advisory specialist for its Global Capital Markets GCM team in Amsterdam or London based As part of the team you will be responsible to steer rating advisory for INGs large Financial Institutions FI clients You will support FI clients and various ING teams by providing rating and capital analysis on bank and insurance companies for instance in case of MA opportunities and the issuance of capital instruments In case of a mandate, you will lead a rating process Furthermore you will coordinate and prepare regular rating updates and tailormade rating advice Based in Amsterdam or London, you will closely collaborate with colleagues in GCM, FI Advisory and Corporate Rating Advisory as well as FI coverage bankers Primary focus would be on EMEA clients, however also Americas and Asian teams could be supported Next to rating agency topics you will advise on bank and insurance regulation, the capital structure and capital instruments for FIs As sustainability ratings becomes more and more important, certain affinity is a virtue, , As our new colleague you will join a small, highly skilled Capital Structuring, Liability Management and Sustainable Markets team within Global Capital Markets You will report directly to head of Capital Structuring, Liability Management and Sustainable Markets who reports to the Head of GCM You will have a second functional line to FI Advisory What youll do

, , , , At ING we are always broadening our horizons Our people have a forwardthinking mentality, a strong cando spirit and enjoy working in an agile environment Do you want to have an impact on not will influence our company results and the risks we are prepared to take Therefore, you need to have a strong sense of selfbelief and stand behind your decisions, , , , Your trainee manager will you are looking for additional guidance you can ask a Senior Manager to mentor you They will coach you, inspire you, introduce you to their network and share their knowledge and insights with you, , You are in charge of your second assignment Now it comes down to addressing your network and taking the initiative We encourage it to gain international experience during this sixmonth period, which is not only great fun but is also good for your personal and professional development, if possible with if possible with local Covid19 restrictions, , , , Besides being given the opportunity to put your talent to good use where it really matters, youll participate in a global training event with all trainees from your year, which will also enable you to quickly build up a large network, , There is more, to give you an idea, we will tell you about the other benefits of working at ING, , , , , , , , , , , , , , When applying for the Risk traineeship April 2021, remember to upload your application CV, motivational questions and grade lists Bachelor and Master till now in English if you are sure you are what we are looking for, go for it, , The first interview round HR interview will be scheduled as soon as you pass the three part assessment, , The second interview round Business Panels will be held in the following weeks, , , Please note we have a limited amount of traineeship positions per traineeship, so we encourage you to apply as soon as possible, , Click on the following links to find out more about the ITP Programme and the selection procedure, , that the results onderhandelingen aan om producten uit het assortiment voordeliger in te kopen Wat breng je mee

Job Title: Business Change Consultant Finance & Risk Reporting
Job Description: Introduction, , Internationale Bank  Business Change Consultant  Finance  Risk  Reporting  Regulatory  Datasystemen  Data quality  Consultancy skills  Stakeholder management  Amsterdam  53k  63k allin40 uur, , Heb jij minimaal 3 jaar relevante werkervaring in Big 4 Financial Services Audit enof Advisory of in Finance  Risk Reporting binnen de bancaire sector Ben jij energiek, data gedreven en gericht op vernieuwing Wil je werken voor een aansprekende grote internationale bank Dan is de functie als Business Change Consultant Finance  Risk Reporting iets voor jou Lees snel verder, , Organization, , Wereldwijd opererende bank, met activiteiten in wholesale, retail, insurance en private banking Je gaat werken binnen een multidisciplinair en agile opererend team, dat zich richt op het invoeren van nieuwe wet en regelgeving op gebied van Finance  Risk Je kunt hierbij denken aan de invoering van Basel IV, het doorvoeren van grote strategische veranderingen binnen bestaande regulatory reporting, zoals FinRep, COREP of Deposito Garantiestelsel Jouw team is vanuit diverse programmas en projecten verantwoordelijk voor het optimaal invoeren van nieuwe wet en regelgeving Hierbij ligt veel nadruk op datasystemen en datakwaliteit Ook wordt er gewerkt aan de realisatie van een uniforme Finance  Risk aanpak, zodat er snel kan worden gereageerd op uitvragen van stakeholders, waaronder DNBECB, , Function, , Als Business Change Consultant ben je gericht op Finance  Risk Reporting, dataprocessen, datakwaliteit, IT systemen en complexe consultancy vraagstukken Je werkt vanuit jouw expertise ook samen met professionals uit de IT organisatie van de bank en andere collegas uit de Finance  Risk business, zoals Product Owners van bepaalde systemen en Business Product Experts Samen met jouw team ben je verantwoordelijk voor de oplevering van projecten op het gebied van Finance  Risk Reporting Regulatory Een goed gestroomlijnde en kwalitatieve aanlevering van data vanuit de diverse entiteiten van de bank is hierbij van groot belang Je organiseert kick off meetings, bewaakt de tijdlijnen en voortgang van projectfasen en je zorgt ervoor dat inhoudelijke vragen vanuit de Business worden beantwoord Alles wordt in werking gesteld om de belangen van interne en externe stakeholders zo goed mogelijk te behartigen, waarbij je de risicos zorgvuldig afweegt, , Via stroomschemas en tekenplaten maak je processen snel inzichtelijk en leid je inhoudelijke meetings in goede banen Ook als het ingewikkelde onderwerpen betreft, waarvan je nog weinig kennis hebt Vanuit jouw functie ben je inhoudelijk deskundige, adviseur, trainer en cordinator tegelijk Je richt je continu op het verbeteren en vernieuwen van reporting Samen met jouw team, en in nauwe samenwerking met de Business, ben je endtoend verantwoordelijk voor strategische change projecten op het gebied van Finance  Risk Reporting Regulatory, , , , Om succesvol te kunnen zijn in deze functie, ben jij of heb jij, , , Offer, , , Application, , Herken jij je in bovenstaand profiel Solliciteren kan via de onderstaande knop Voor meer informatie over deze vacature kun je contact opnemen met Michel Maaswinkel via 31 20 489 23 20 of mail naar recruitmentyoungfinancialscom, , Closing date, 24022021

ING is looking for a passionate NFR Risk officer with a focus on IT Risk, , Think Forward Our purpose is to empower people to stay a step ahead in life and in business We are an industry recognized strong brand with positive recognition from customers in many countries, strong financial position, omnichannel distribution strategy and international network If you want to work at a place with lots of freedom to innovate, where we believe that you can live by the Agile manifesto without jeopardizing the necessary continuity, compliance and QA measures, where we are committed to deliver stable and secure services to end users, and where we have a no nonsense gettingthings done mentality, please read on, , As a you will make sure that the teams working within Wholesale Banking Advanced Analytics WBAA address risks in the right way, at the right time Your main interest and expertise lies with IT Risk including addressing the threats and vulnerabilities that come with using or developing technologies and finding new ways to adhere to INGs IT risk and control compliance requirements You are eager to build your IT risk knowledge working together with a team of experienced risk professionals as well as skilled data engineers and data scientists, , You want to promote a risk culture and work on improving the way in which WBAA addresses risks This includes finding ways to scale yourself so teams can work as independently as possible on their IT risk related tasks You have a critical mind, can take other risk areas into consideration and are able to engage with and add value to the wider risk community by your innovative approach, , You will be part of a small team squad of 1st line NFR professionals and enjoy a creative atmosphere where trying things out is encouraged, , , , , , , , , , , , The Wholesale Banking Advanced Analytics team is a team of 100 people that has the mission to make Wholesale Banking in ING data driven We do this by combining Big Data technology with Data Science to deliver high value solutions and products for our organization We work in a fun and creative environment and were dedicated to bringing out the best in both each other and our projects Youll be part of the NonFinancial Risk NFR squad within WBAA, which is without a doubt the best part, , , , Search no further If you answered all of the previous with yes, you want to work at Wholesale Banking Advanced Analytics Your job will focus not only on the daytoday questions on IT risk and other NFR topics, but also on the data and analytics strategy of Wholesale Bank from an NFR perspective This means you will work operationally on addressing the risks encountered by the WBAA teams, as well as strategically to improve and innovate the way in which the Wholesale Bank and WBAA deal with risk, , , , Our preferred candidate has a Masters degree in an area related to IT however, practical experience makes up for the lack of a formal degree related to IT You also have a working understanding of software development and basic understanding of commonly used technologies in the field Agile development experience is a nice to have You have one to four years of proven, relevant experience within the risk function of a commercial organization and indepth knowledge of risk frameworks and areas such IT management, IT governance, IT security, operational risk and compliance You can express yourself both in writing and verbally in English and preferably in Dutch You have experience in building and maintaining relations with other departments in a complex environment, are collaborative by nature and take things on in a proactive and open minded manner, , , , , , Working at ING means working in a dynamic and international setting Individual development of our employees is very important and that is why ING offers excellent courses and programs You will become a member of the Wholesale Banking Advanced Analytics team, a prestigious, nononsense and highoutput datascience team Diva behavior is not tolerated, neither is underperformance We only hire people with exceptional talents and capabilities You will work on the most innovative projects within ING, , Are you keen to know more or apply, , We are looking forward to getting to know you

The world of banking is changing faster than ever, enjoy the best experience in our Risk Management traineeship During our twoyear programme you create your own career within Risk You learn more about your chosen discipline and the financial services sector Our trainee programme also allows you to discover yourself through a wide selection of online professional and personal skills trainings Make an impact as a trainee  At ING we are always broadening our horizons Our people have a forwardthinking mentality, a strong cando spirit and enjoy working in an agile environment Do you want to have an impact on not only the financial lives of close to 8 million customers but also on the bank of the future Why wait, discover how today Above all, change banking means taking action The financial world is currently facing many changes and as a Risk Management trainee you play an important role in tackling them The findings from the analysis you perform, mainly on behalf of Retail and Wholesale Banking, will influence our company results and the risks we are prepared to take Therefore, you need to have a strong sense of selfbelief and stand behind your decisions Your first year Your trainee manager will assist you in choosing your first rotation which lasts approximately six months During your rotation you are set to work on projects related to Credit  Trading Risk, Balance Sheet Risk, Risk Services, Compliance, Operation Risk Management or Regulatory You are handed a lot of responsibility within your role right from day one As a trainee you will also receive guidance from your line manager If you are looking for additional guidance you can ask a Senior Manager to mentor you They will coach you, inspire you, introduce you to their network and share their knowledge and insights with you You are in charge of your second assignment Now it comes down to addressing your network and taking the initiative We encourage it to gain international experience during this sixmonth period, which is not only great fun but is also good for your personal and professional development, if possible with if possible with local Covid19 restrictions Your benefits Besides being given the opportunity to put your talent to good use where it really matters, youll participate in a global training event with all trainees from your year, which will also enable you to quickly build up a large network There is more, to give you an idea, we will tell you about the other benefits of working at ING

Transaction Monitoring Expert, Building up first line Compliance function, Building up first line Compliance function, About Our Client, The Global KYC organisation is part of INGs COO domain Its purpose is Enabling people and organisations to use our banking services by ensuring a compliant and competitive KYC ecosystem Our Global KYC organisation is a first line of defence department providing the ING business and functions with guidance, standardised solutions in the area of KYCrelated regulations as well as supporting realising operational excellence In our Global KYC organisation you will be working with many colleagues from different disciplines, geographies and backgrounds You will be part of managing and supporting the transformation towards this global organisation and as such contribute significantly to the realisation of the One Agile Way of Working methodology within ING The Global Transaction Monitoring TM organization TM Pillar is part of the Global KYC organization It sets standards and provides content expertise on the implementation of various KYCrelated laws  policies to the squads or circles, ensures the alignment with the other lines of defence and represents KYC and ING to internal  external parties incl regulators and client events The TM pillar, together with the local TM experts, plays a vital role in ensuring effective and efficient compliance with the KYCrelated regulations, more specific the AMLCTF legislation Within the TM Pillar, we have dedicated teams with indepth KYC knowledge and expertise one of the teams is the Policy  Risk Coverage team This team works closely with Compliance on our KYC Policy and is responsible for setting the requirements for transaction monitoring scenarios and controls for our global banking products and services, including reviewing country specific scenarios and controls It is our responsibility to monitor globally proper risk coverage and report hereon

The Team, The Digital Selling team sits within Digital Product, the department responsible for PVHs digital B2B buying and selling experiences The Digital Selling teams product portfolio covers the full endtoend process of digital wholesale selling eg Product Catalog, Digital Showroom and Order Intake We constantly look for ways to improve our users lives This means that our daytoday is working on better integration, technology, services and processes to continuously make the selling experience better for our users, , The Digital Selling team consists of two pillars Product  responsible for working closely with our users to ideate, design and build new features and products, and Operations  responsible for change management, launching, harmonization and continuation of our digital products across markets The Operations team consists of training  communication, Market Launch management and Product Environment oversight, , , , As our new Product Designer, you will be working closely with our Product Owners to drive UX strategy, research, interface and interaction design within our current product suite with the aim to not only improve our users lives but delight them, , Youre passionate about solving user problems, not just by making things prettier, but by really challenging processes and current ways of thinking to truly improve the user experience, , We are in the growth phase of our Product Centre of excellence, which means were putting together the right mix of product experts to transform PVHs approach to digital products, rethinking how technology supports PVHs business and customer goals and building new products from scratch As the Product Designer you will be the design lead to drive UX strategy, guide user conversations, and ensure our end to end customer experience is simple and optimal, , , , Working closely with our two digital selling Product Owners, together you investigate and clarify customer problems, reshaping them to realise opportunities for product innovation With our very engaged user base you will be required to show empathy while leading interviews, prototyping, wireframing and creating feedback loops, while paying exceptional attention to detail, , , , You will collaborate with remoteworking developers within the product team to ensure a common understanding of the solutions to customer problems so that developers are equipped with the right knowledge and designs to work effectively You will be able to communicate and deliver the required design artefacts and ensure product quality and happy users, , You will be working on one of the key strategic focus areas of PVH Digital B2B selling in a dynamic, young and ambitious team Your colleagues come from all over the world, which makes the work environment very diverse and international

Work environment The COO Risk  Finance department delivers Risk  Finance related services to its stakeholders, ie Group Finance, country CFOs and Wholesale Banking, Risk, Tax and Bank Treasury These services encompass operations and change initiatives for accounting, reporting, data foundation and business advice services, including system, process, data and information management, and analytics capabilities By design, the services are reliable, secure and in control Change is delivered in accordance with the Finance strategy and implementation and decommissioning roadmap The Tribe Statutory and Regulatory Reporting delivers and enables the organisation to provide ontime, highquality, standardized financial reporting solutions, in compliance with external and internal regulations As a BA, you work in a squad with around 79 colleagues covering the whole range of expertise in the squad Together, you work on a common purpose You like to work in a constructive way in a multidisciplinary squad Together with your squad members you do everything within your power to realise your common mission day by day The BA reports to the Chapter Lead The BA can fulfil the role of Product Owner within a squad, determining the priorities for the squad Profile description We are looking for an energetic and driven expert with strong analytical capabilities who uses stateoftheart methods and techniques for business analysis You have integral, domainexceeding knowledge of Finance You are an excellent communicator and able to build bridges between different stakeholders You are able to convincingly put forward your proposals and are a real team player in reaching broad agreement on the road to follow In this way, you can contribute to delivering standardised, uniform and fully adapted solutions to complex Finance issues and processes You analyse complex Finance business issues that go beyond squad andor tribe boundaries, with a view to designing complete solutions for the requested change You deliver excellently substantiated analyses using stateoftheart techniques and tools, which lead to functional designs that cover all change deliverables You are focused on process design and the translation to IT You ensure that all requirements of all relevant stakeholders are acknowledged in the analyses and the different solution designs You support tribes and squads in their decisionmaking by presenting the different functional and solution design alternatives and their impact in a clear way You guarantee that the business requirements and nonfunctional requirements are translated into IT Solution requirements You work together with IT architects and specialists to come up with a suitable IT solution In doing so, you conduct a number of coherent analyses Requirements analysis You elicit sets of coherent requirements You make sure that the requirements are complete, consistent, of good quality, that they are translated correctly in the design, and that they are maintained and, if necessary, adjusted if changes occur You support the product owners and the squads in managing the backlog by translating and prioritising the epics into features and, together with the squad, into user stories Process analysis You analyse the current situation, the problems that occur and the underlying causes Based on this analysis, you provide clear process designs Information analysis You analyse the necessary input, output, and adjustment of data in the client processes You analyse the information need You investigate the quality of the captured data and come up with solutions to improve quality Risk analysis You are able to translate the policy and regulation of ORM, Compliance and Legal into design solutions Required skills, knowledge  experience

and IFRS related topics, , , , , , The GPC team is a small team of highly qualified professionals The team has an open, informal atmosphere, , You will work closely with many internal and external parties such as risk managers globally, finance, senior management, the external accountant and regulators We work in a dynamic environment, balancing daily and monthly work with increasing demands from the regulators and the internal and external accountants, , , , A successful candidate should have strong analytical skills, a sharp eye for detail and a structured way of thinking and working As the role is global the candidate should have good communication skills and a proactive attitude He or she owns the work until it is correct and complete At the same time he or she owns different processes, does the maintenance in the programming that is required for keeping these processes running and strives to improve these processes, , , , , , , A job from 36 to 40 hours and a unique offer Job Title: Traineeship - Wholesale Banking April 2021 - ING Group
Location: Hook of Holland, South Holland, Netherlands
Job Description: The world of banking is changing faster than ever, enjoy the best experience in our Wholesale Banking traineeship, , During our twoyear programme you create your own career within Wholesale Banking You learn more about your chosen discipline and the financial services sector Our trainee programme also allows you to discover yourself through a wide selection of online professional and personal skills trainings, , , , At ING we are always broadening our horizons Our people have a forwardthinking mentality, a strong cando spirit and enjoy working in an agile environment Do you want to have an impact on not only the financial lives of close to 8 million customers but also on the bank of the future Why wait, discover how today, , Wherever you work in the company, you will be responsible for following developments in the market and establishing a longterm relationship with our customers You therefore have a sense of enterprise and you know what is important to our customers You have a keen desire to optimize our services to serve our clients in their best interest In varying teams of experts, you will continue to make considerable contributions to our Wholesale Banking business, , , , Your trainee manager will assist you in choosing your first rotation which lasts approximately six months Based on your own interests, you can indicate your preferences for your first rotation so that we can work together to find a suitable starting role for you This enables you to get to know several departments within ING You will be involved in the daily activities of Wholesale Banking from day one You will be responsible for fulfilling a concrete assignment, such as working on the present customer portfolios together with the Relationship Manager or on a deal within Corporate Finance, , As a trainee you will also receive guidance from your line manager If you are looking for additional guidance you can ask a Senior Manager to mentor you They will coach you, inspire you, introduce you to their network and share their knowledge and insights with you, , You are in charge of your second assignment Now it comes down to addressing your network and taking the initiative We encourage it to gain international experience during this sixmonth period, which is not only great fun but is also good for your personal and professional development, if possible with if possible with local Covid19 restrictions, , , , Besides being given the opportunity to put your talent to good use where it really matters, youll participate in a
