Vacature van LMH Engineering, locatie Beuningen GE, , Wat ga je doen, , Sinds de corona crises is de vraag naar efficinte en betrouwbare sorteersystemen groot, omdat steeds meer mensen online producten bestellen Jij kan bijdragen aan deze groeiende industrie Zo zal je aan de slag gaan met het uittekenen van sorteersystemen Deze systemen worden opgebouwd van ontwerp tot aan de productie De pakketjes of producten die het systeem moet behandelen variren van kleine lichtgewicht pakketjes tot aan zware vreemd gevormde pakketjes Aan jou is het om je creativiteit en technische inzicht te gebruiken om de beste en meest optimale machines te maken voor de klant, , , , , , , , , , , , Dit bedrijf levert de meest innovatieve en vernieuwende klant specifieke sorteersystemen Deze systemen worden geheel in samenspraak met de klant ontworpen en geproduceerd Het bedrijf heeft klanten in onder andere de retail, wholesale en Ecommerce, Binnen het bedrijf geldt er een open en informele sfeer waar altijd ruimte is voor feedback Bovendien zijn er volop doorgroeimogelijkheden door de groeipotentie van het bedrijf Zo kom je te werken binnen een jong, dynamisch en gemotiveerd team, , , , Klik op de knop solliciteer op deze vacature om direct te solliciteren, , Voor meer informatie over deze vacature en andere mogelijkheden kun je contact met ons opnemen, via 31 20 757 0000 of yourivia de button Solliciteer nu op deze pagina, , Ben je zelf momenteel niet genteresseerd maar ken je d persoon voor deze vacature Share de, vacature en uiteraard zullen wij jou hiervoor op gepaste manier belonen, , 5cd8a0b9cc68f9ffa4c9253553278a55

Bedrijfsomschrijving, , Voor deze vacature werken wij, Technicum, samen met onze opdrachtgever KPN KPN is leverancier van telecommunicatie en ICTdiensten en biedt consumenten vaste en mobiele telefonie, internet en televisie Voor zakelijke klanten verzorgt KPN complete telecommunicatie en ICToplossingen KPN biedt wereldwijd wholesalenetwerkdiensten aan andere operators, , , , , , , Je start de dag rustig op met een power ontbijt en een bak koffie Je start je tablet op, waarop je eerste bon verschijnt Om 0800 uur s ochtends word je verwacht bij je eerste klant Met je werkauto rij je naar de klant, je stelt je voor als visitekaartje van KPN en voert de desbetreffende opdracht uit, , Als telecom monteur is geen dag hetzelfde Naast dat je de verschillende pakketten van KPN bij de klant aansluit en installeert, los je ook storingen op aan bestaande installaties bij de klant thuis, maar soms ook in de centrales KPN, Als KPN monteur ben je pas tevreden wanneer je je werk technisch goed hebt uitgevoerd en de klant tevreden achterlaat op het moment dat je de deur uitstapt Als ambassadeur van KPN adviseer je klanten over de producten en diensten van KPN en signaleer je verkoop kansen, , Ben je technisch onderlegd, kan je zowel zelfstandig als in teamverband werken en krijg jij energie om klanten tevreden en met een glimlach achter te laten Werk je graag voor marktleider KPN als fulltime Telecom monteur en word je enthousiast van de bovenstaande werkzaamheden Lees dan gauw verder, , Aantoonbare interesse in de telecom is een must, ervaring niet per se Technisch inzicht heb je of heb je niet Vak gerelateerde kennis is bij te leren Met twee rechterhanden, maar zonder technische werkervaring of opleiding, kom je in aanmerking voor deze functie In een periode van 8 weken word je in een intensief opleidingstraject klaargestoomd tot Telecom monteur, waarbij je diverse certificaten gaat behalen Daarnaast loop je mee met een ervaren monteur om de fijne kneepjes van het vak in de praktijk te leren, , Bekijk via onderstaande link een filmpje van een KPN monteur, zo krijg je een goede indruk httpsyoutube86QvjKRwtNc, , , , Ben jij die probleemoplosser binnen je vrienden of familiekring met betrekking tot het internet, televisie en computers Ben jij goed in de omgang met mensen en kan je je kennis duidelijk overbrengen om klanten gedegen te informeren, , , , Je bent woonachtig in of in de directe omgeving van, , , , , Werken bij KPN garandeert jou een gevarieerde werkdag, elke dag opnieuw Pas jij in het functieprofiel van Telecom monteur, dan zorgen wij er samen met KPN voor dat je wordt opgeleid Vanaf dag n ontvang je salaris volgens de KPN CAO bruto uurloon 1313  2050 pmnd obv 36 urige werkweek  4,30 koffiegeld per dag, , Tijdens het opleidingstraject volg je diverse trainingen Zo wordt er de ene dag ingezoomd op gesprekstechnieken en leer je volgens KPN normen te communiceren met de klant De andere dag ga je in op het technische aspect van het werk Tijdens dit traject behaal je verschillende certificaten, denk hierbij aan HVD, KVD, NEN3140, VCA Uiteraard is dit een beknopte weergave van het gehele opleidingstraject, , , , Het betreft een fulltime functie, vast werk voor een lange tijd De intentie is om een jarenlang dienstverband met elkaar aan te gaan Bij goed functioneren kans op overname The Financial Markets  Group Treasury Investing IT area of ING is responsible for the design, development and maintenance of the systems used in the Wholesale Banking domain for trading and processing cash equity, equity derivatives, commodity derivatives, fixed income and securities financing products The business is active in Europe, UK, America and Asia We are looking for a strong DevOps Engineer passionate about IT and Banking, solutionfocused and able to contribute to design, development, test automation and hardening security, stability, deployment of our frontoffice systems for global exchange traded products, , What youll do, , You will be responsible for the support, maintenance and evolution of our systems used in the equity derivatives domain You will be actively participating in the extension of the platforms capabilities by developing, deploying and configuring new features, components and releases in an agilescrum way You are also responsible for the availability, stability and performance of those applications You will be working in close cooperation with colleagues from various departmentslocations and also with vendors You keep the IT risk in control You have close contact with end users from the trading and sales desks to provide them an excellent service By doing so, you ensure that ING can trade competitively in the market, with high reliability and in a compliant way, , Your profile, , University degree in Computer Science or engineering with strong IT background 4 years of hands on work experience with electronic trading platforms Extensive work experience in a DevOps role within IT, preferably for banking Proficiency on software development in Java or C or another modern programming language Scala is a plus You have a positive attitude, you think in solutions You enjoy new technologies and methods, and you can apply them into new ideas and concrete solutions You are always trying to improve your skills and get to better at what you do, to be able to keep adapting to the new situations and always deliver the highest quality results You are a team player, you trust others and can be trusted You are available to participate on application support activities outside office hours eg early or late shift during weekdays, standby shifts or weekend deployments Your background shows most of the following skills General domain knowledge on Financial Markets trading Experience building custom components as part of an existing architecture Scripting for general automation in UNIX  Windows servers Working knowledge of SQLOracle Experience with database as a service is a plus Working knowledge of continuous deliveryintegration pipelines such as AzureDevOps and their core functions Working knowledge of middleware and network protocols Good knowledge of ITIL processes Experience with agile way of working, , Your responsibilities, , You support and maintain custom components for critical banking applications in the area of equity and equity derivatives trading You elicit functionalnonfunctional requirements from users and translate them into user stories for the squad backlog or for the vendor backlog Together with other engineers and the product owner, you collaborate to ensuring the quality of the vendorbuilt software delivery, testing and defect management You providing support in DTAP phase QA  deploy application in test, acceptance and production You perform supportmaintenance of applications IT infrastructure You contribute to Incident, Problem and Change Management, including help in structural solution for reoccurring problems and keeping firstrate levels of service management You contribute to providing high quality evidencing to IT risk controls You are able to give substantial contribution to changes, covering all functional and nonfunctional aspects of the software systems, and in close collaboration with multiple squad members You demonstrate the ability to operate independently, proactively and diligently on the assigned tasks to complete them ontime and rightfirsttime to the satisfaction of the product owner and stakeholders You demonstrate a history of continuous improvement, personal development, and outstanding team contribution, , What do we offer, , Excellent salary and benefits package Extensive training possibilities Full time position 40hweek Working in a dynamic and international company with a great organizational culture A very professional working environment, where you are empowered to be your best

Job Title: Medewerkers Groothandel - 8 tot 40 uur per week - Hengelo
Job Description: Voor onze opdrachtgever zijn wij opzoek naar meerdere medewerkers voor een groothandel in onder anderen levensmiddelen en nonfood artikelen, , In deze functie ga jij samen met je collegas verschillende werkzaamheden uitvoeren, Denk hierbij aan het leeghalen van vakken en stellingen, verplaatsen van producten en materialen, schappen opnieuw indelen, schoonmaakwerkzaamheden en daarnaast help jij de klanten met eventuele vragen, , Je komt in team met hardwerkende en gezellige collegas De werktijden zijn tussen 0900 en 2200 en de werkdagen zijn van maandag tm zaterdag Onze ideale kandidaat is enthousiast, gemotiveerd en steekt graag de handen uit de mouwen, , Het salaris is afhankelijk van je leeftijd en ligt tussen de E5,87 en E11,24 per uur Hiernaast bouw je nog 18 procent aan extra reserveringen op Ook kom je in aanmerking voor een reiskostenvergoeding, , Ben jij beschikbaar en zin om lekker bij te cashen Wacht dan niet langer en reageer direct

The Financial Markets  Group Treasury Investing IT area of ING is responsible for the design, development and maintenance of the systems used in the Wholesale Banking domain for trading and processing cash equity, equity derivatives, commodity derivatives, fixed income and securities financing products The business is active in Europe, UK, America and Asia, , We are looking for a strong DevOps Engineer passionate about IT and Banking, solutionfocused and able to contribute to design, development, test automation and hardening security, stability, deployment of our frontoffice systems for global exchange traded products, , , , You will be responsible for the support, maintenance and evolution of our systems used in the equity derivatives domain You will be actively participating in the extension of the platforms capabilities by developing, deploying and configuring new features, components and releases in an agilescrum way You are also responsible for the availability, stability and performance of those applications You will be working in close cooperation with colleagues from various departmentslocations and also with vendors You keep the IT risk in control You have close contact with end users from the trading and sales desks to provide them an excellent service By doing so, you ensure that ING can trade competitively in the market, with high reliability and in a compliant way

Imagine, , Working in a challenging and international environment to enable the bank in providing relevant financial services to our clients As software engineer of the GCOB team you work with the other software engineers with the aim to improve the overall experience of the wholesale client journey, , DevOps teams are the foundation of our IT organization They work under mandate and are selforganizing The team is fully responsible for the quality of the delivered code, from solution design until solving production issues, , , , The Wholesale  International domain within IT Systems supports the wholesale bank across the globe The Wholesale Client cluster delivers and supports global business systems, including process automation in the areas of CRM, Client Onboarding, Client Data Management, Document and Case Management The Client cluster has global responsibility for servicing more than 20 locations divided in multiple regions The delivery unit is working closely with strategic programs within other domains to realize the banks digital transformation, , , , You can be a key success factor in meeting of those ambitions within the Global Client Onboarding GCOB area GCOB is a cornerstone in the KYC process for international clients banking with Rabobank A proper and good KYC platform is key for the banks license to operate KYC is very important to make sure risks are in line with regulatory standards and the Banks own risk appetite The application you will be working on is globally used by over a thousand employees facilitating the banks KYC processes, , The GCOB team is currently working in London and Utrecht and will be transferred completely to Utrecht at the end of 2020 All communication will be in English as the endusers, DevOps teams, and other stakeholders reside on different locations across the globe, , , , Collaboration is at the heart of everything we do Our DevOps teams bring talented people together to execute all change and run activities of the relevant application You will be Tshaped along the way to help delivering value to the product, , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , Youll already be aware that Rabobank is a financial services provider for 71 million customers in 40 countries But did you know that we aim to contribute to real change with our Growing a better world together mission We do so in countless ways, such as, , , , , Do you want to become the ideal version of yourself We would love to help you achieve this by focusing firmly on your growth, development, and investing in an environment where you keep learning every day We give you the space to innovate and initiate In this way, we offer you numerous opportunities to grow and help you exceed your expectations, to do the right thing exceptionally well, and to therefore grow as a professional In addition, with us on the basis of a 40 hour working week, you can also expect

Zoek jij een uitdaging als Technisch Consultant Dan biedt Logres Business Solutions jou intern een mooie, technische uitdaging binnen complexe ERP omgevingen Wat ga je doen Als Technisch Consultant krijg jij de kans om binnen Logres Business Solutions je stempel te drukken in deze technische, dynamische, interne en klantgerichte rol In deze functie ben jij breed inzetbaar dien je snel te kunnen schakelen tussen de business en interne organisatie Een onderdeel van deze functie is tevens ondersteuning bieden op technisch vlak aan de Support afdeling De Business Consultants richten zich op de requirement analyse bij de klant en stellen deze vast De technische adviezen, koppelingen en integraties, installatie van de software en rapportages vallen onder de verantwoording van de Technisch Consultant Wanneer jij dit nodig acht zal je, in overleg, ook bij de opdrachtgever je werkzaamheden mogen uitvoeren Bij deze uitdagende functie horen de volgende taken en verantwoordelijkheden

Introductie, , Ben jij een echte gamer of heb je affiniteit met games Wil jij als developer APIs ontwikkelen voor oa Bolcom en Mediamarkt En zou je naast PHP met Python aan de slag willen Wellicht heb je dan een nieuwe job gevonden bij deze groothandel in games en consumentenelektronica, , Organisatie, , De kans is groot dat jij ooit een gameconsole heb gekocht via dit bedrijf Deze groothandel in games, consoles en consumentenelektronica levert namelijk al jaren aan grote namen als Bolcom, Mediamarkt  Amazon, maar ook aan de zaak op de hoek van de straat In 1995 zijn ze ontstaan op een zolderkamer door de twee eigenaren die games wilden verkopen Inmiddels zijn ze marktleider in de Benelux op het gebied van games en ontstaan er steeds meer zusterondernemingen die zich richten op andere markten zoals bijvoorbeeld Azi en de marktplaatsen, , Het bedrijf bestaat uit totaal 120 medewerkers, waarvan een groot deel actief is in het magazijn Twee keer per jaar wordt er voor iedereen een personeelsfeest georganiseerd, waaronder een Nieuwjaars diner Verder hebben ze afgelopen jaar de actieve uitjes weer een nieuw leven in geblazen en zijn ze gaan bowlen en hebben ze een pubquiz gespeeld, , In een korte tijd is het bedrijf enorm gegroeid en ze merken nu dat ze op het gebied van automatiseren tekort schieten Ze hebben hierin meer ondersteuning nodig, waardoor ze nu op zoek zijn naar versterking voor het kleine team van developers Wil jij als developer je steentje bijdragen aan de verkoop van games Lees dan snel verder, , Functie, , Je komt terecht in een team van 4 andere developers de IT manager, een junior programmeur, iemand die zich focust op de infrastructuur en iemand die eerstelijns support levert Als PHP developer houd jij je bezig met het doorontwikkelen van de applicaties en bestaande functionaliteiten volgens een Agile werkwijze Je bent betrokken bij de gehele ontwikkelstraat Hiernaast ligt een grote focus op het ontwikkelen van APIkoppelingen voor hun klanten en leveranciers, zodat alle orders goed doorkomen en het verdere logistieke proces goed verloopt Er wordt voornamelijk gewerkt met PHP en Python Ervaring met de laatstgenoemde techniek is niet vereist, er is ruimte om je deze taal onder de knie te krijgen Wanneer je daar extra trainingen voor nodig hebt, is daarvoor budget beschikbaar, , Functieeisen, , , , Aanbod

kun je dan binnenkort aan de slag in Veghel Organisatie Zwembaden, irrigatie, warmtepompen Dit bedrijf in Veghel is een groothandel in allerlei leidingsystemen Overal waar water doorheen gaat, wordt waar je zeker geen nummer bent Er wordt ontzettend veel aandacht besteed aan jouw persoonlijke ontwikkeling Met behulp van een ontwikkelplan worden jouw persoonlijke doelen uitgestippeld Daarnaast is voeg je echt meerwaarde toe aan het resultaat Je ontwikkelt webshops met Shopware en daarnaast bouw je applicaties Al je werk wordt internationaal gebruikt Een van de uitdagingen waar ze nu tegenaan locations and ecommerce carriers You also keep your eye on cost efficiency by validating invoices of our logistics providers, , You are a key user for OMS and TMS, are focused on ontime delivery with always key Therefore, you are continuously looking for improvement opportunities in existing omnichannel supply chain processes to improve our performance based on certain KPIs, , We are looking for someone who is eager to take that extra step in creating the perfect delivery proposition for our customers Good is not enough, we want customers to be surprised by our service, , You report to the Efulfilment Manager and are part of our Supply Chain department Both internaland external stakeholder management are a huge part of your job You collaborate with our Webshop, Marketing, Planning, BAM omnichannel IT and Finance teams You also are the first point of contact for our ecom logistic partners, carriers, local fulfilment teams CH  US, and our Customer Care team for efulfilment related questions Since we continuously look for improvements of our omnichannel tools, you also reach out to suppliers to collect relevant performance data and work together with Business AM omnichannel working closely with our users to ideate, design and build new features and products, and Operations  responsible for change management, launching, harmonization and continuation of our digital products across markets The Operations team consists of training  communication, Market Launch management and Product Environment oversight, , , , Youre passionate about solving customer problems with products that delight our users Your facilitating leadership style inspires Product Owners and the wider Digital Product team Together with the team, youll create a vision and strategy that steers product development and takes PVHs sales organization to the next level Beyond engaging with and influencing senior and Clevel management, your energy and drive brings teams together from across the organization Does this sound like you, , , , As Product Manager Digital Selling you will be working closely with our two digital selling Product Owners Together you shape opportunities for product innovation and you are a driving force for our global digital transformation, educating stakeholders on the product management process, while building a product management Centre of Excellence, , , , You will translate business strategy into product strategy, paving the way for the Product Owners in Digital selling to drive and deliver their product roadmaps, , , , You will collaborate with the Technology and Service and Processes departments to shape the Digital Selling ecosystem and processes You have experience in creating products that need to integrate with a corporate environment, and youre aware of the challenges this can bring You recognize that asking the right questions and challenging the status quo will drive simplification in the organization and allow your team to sense and respond faster to company and industry changes, , You will be working on one of the key strategic focus areas of PVH Digital B2B selling in a dynamic, young and ambitious team Your colleagues will come from all over the world, which makes the work environment very diverse and international

MAIN PURPOSE, , As SOP Demand Planner you are responsible for running, managing, improving, and strongly influencing the monthly SOP process, to ensure the best possible demand forecast for timely and optimal availability of Rituals products in all lines of businesses and countries, , , , You work in the Supply Chain Department and are part of the SOP team You report directly to the SOP Manager and partner with all supply chain teams, lines of businesses retail, wholesale, travel, and ecommerce, our Innovation and Marketing department Besides internal stakeholders you work together with our planning tool supplier on continues improvement projects, , You are eager to improve forecast accuracy and product category availability for all lines of businesses LOBs by challenging business decisions with strategic analyses Based on category forecast analyses on the entire Rituals product portfolio you indicate and highlight focus areas and related actions to the other SOP demand planners As SOP demand planner you are constantly balancing global demand and supply You make sure forecast actions are reflected in the SOP salesplan accordingly, resulting in a monthly rolling forecast The SOP forecast serves as input for the monthly supply planning process, shop planning forecast and financial budget Next to category forecasting, you are constantly looking for business process improvements and opportunities to further improve our end to end planning tool Logility, , As demand planner you are responsible for the completion of the monthly SOP cycle During this cycle you are in charge as process lead to make sure forecast accuracy results, category trends and business inputs are translated to required forecast actions and are reflected in the rolling salesplan You keep deadlines and highlight risks  opportunities supported by all SOP demand planners, , , , , , , You are keen to be the best in class within your profession You are flexible, you enjoy making things better every day and you are a team player who thrives within a dynamic, fastgrowing company, , , , Raymond Cloosterman, CEO Rituals, , We are a global brand, established in Amsterdam, The Netherlands, in 2000 Our ambition is to grow sustainably and become  and remain  the number one global luxury brand in cosmetics Today, Rituals operates in more than 730 stores, across 29 countries throughout Europe, Asia, the Middle East and North and South America with the aim to open 1000 stores by 2020, , By joining Rituals, youll get to experience a strong culture and entrepreneurial spirit which empowers you to create your meaningful career We care about the wellbeing of our staff, as much as we value the wellbeing of the planet By passionately looking after both, we believe we can pave the way to a more sustainable world and take appropriate action to limit our footprint on Mother Earth Youll have a strong sense of purpose at Rituals Our mission is to make people feel good and touch as many lives as possible Independent of your role, you will create a positive impact on our daily business, , , , If its you were looking for, please dont hesitate and send in your application Well be in touch soon, , Acquisition is not appreciated, , YOUR BODY YOUR SOUL YOUR RITUALS

Job Title: HBO Workingalong Internship Corporate Clients Relationship Management (Openstaand)
Job Description: ING is looking for, , an enthusiastic Bachelor HBO student, preferably in the field of Economics, Econometrics, Business Administration, Finance or Law for a 6 months internship from January 2021, , You will be part of the International Business Clients Desk team within the ING Corporate Clients Wholesale Banking in Amsterdam This team operates as the first point of contact for listed companies and  or companies with a turnover of EUR 250 million and more product needs The top of commercial banking clients, , You will have daily contact with various stakeholders within ING and you will contribute to achieving the teams objectives You are going to liaise the subject of your research with the team and a maximum of 25 of your total internship duration is made available for this research The subject of your research can vary from a product or process to, for example, ING services, but we are happy to think along with you for possible alternative subjects if you do not already have one in mind The other 75 of your time you will work together with our team to gain knowledge and experience in the banking world, , , , , , Most of the time you will work together in a Relationship Management team to broaden your knowledge and experience in banking products and processes, , , , The IBCD department is located in AmsterdamZuidoost and is part of ING Corporate Clients, which in turn is a part of the ING Wholesale Banking division As an Intern of the IBCD team you work in a challenging and dynamic environment and you are part of a professional, experienced and enthusiastic team with an open atmosphere Working in the team will give you an excellent opportunity to continuously develop yourself and become acquainted with many aspects of banking business, , , , , , A driven and proactive personality, you make every effort to deliver excellent service and quality to customers and to your contacts within ING network You will find the balance between client and ING interests and perform a good dialogue with the Relationship Manager who is ultimately responsible for the relationship with clients in the Netherlands, , You are part of the team and together we ensure that our clients are efficiently and at all times well served In addition, you anticipate the wishes and needs of the team, take the right action and come up with good ideas, , You also play an important role in coordinating KYC activities for customers and you ensure proper preparation and handling of processes in which you are involved, , , , To be able to do an internship at ING, you must be enrolled at a Dutch educational institution throughout your internship, , , , Do you recognize yourself in this profile, please let us know Do you have any questions about this position or about ING as an employer Please contact Luba Nakropina at LubaNakropina2ingcom We would like to meet you You can also apply via the application button below

The world of banking is changing faster than ever, enjoy the best experience in our Wholesale Banking traineeship, , During our twoyear programme you create your own career within Wholesale Banking You learn more about your chosen discipline and the financial services sector Our trainee programme also allows you to discover yourself through a wide selection of online professional and personal skills trainings, , , , At ING we are always broadening our horizons Our people have a forwardthinking mentality, a strong cando spirit and enjoy working in an agile environment Do you want to have an impact on not only the financial lives of close to 8 million customers but also on the bank of the future Why wait, discover how today, , Wherever you work in the company, you will be responsible for following developments in the market and establishing a longterm relationship with our customers You therefore have a sense of enterprise and you know what is important to our customers You have a keen desire to optimize our services to serve our clients in their best interest In varying teams of experts, you will continue to make considerable contributions to our Wholesale Banking business, , , , Your trainee manager will assist you in choosing your first rotation which lasts approximately six months Based on your own interests, you can indicate your preferences for your first rotation so that we can work together to find a suitable starting role for you This enables you to get to know several departments within ING You will be involved in the daily activities of Wholesale Banking from day one You will be responsible for fulfilling a concrete assignment, such as working on the present customer portfolios together with the Relationship Manager or on a deal within Corporate Finance, , As a trainee you will also receive guidance from your line manager If you are looking for additional guidance you can ask a Senior Manager to mentor you They will coach you, inspire you, introduce you to their network and share their knowledge and insights with you, , You are in charge of your second assignment Now it comes down to addressing your network and taking the initiative We encourage it to gain international experience during this sixmonth period, which is not only great fun but is also good for your personal and professional development, if possible with if possible with local Covid19 restrictions, , , , Besides being given the opportunity to put your talent to good use where it really matters, youll participate in a global training event with all trainees from your year, which will also enable you to quickly build up a large network, , There is more, to give you an idea, we will tell you about the other benefits of working at ING, , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , When applying for the Wholesale Banking traineeship April 2021, remember to upload your application CV, motivational questions and grade lists Bachelor and Master till now in English if you are sure you are what we are looking for, go for it, , The first interview round HR interview will be scheduled as soon as you pass the three part assessment, , The second interview round Business Panels will be held in the following weeks, , , Please note we have a limited amount of traineeship positions per traineeship, so we encourage you to apply as soon as possible, , Click on the following links to find out more about the and the , , that the results will remain definite for a future application for one of our traineeships This means that you cannot apply again after not passing either our assessment or interview stage

Job Description, , BALR is on the lookout for an ERP Data Analyst Do you have an interest in fashionlifestyle and would you like to play a key role in reaching the full potential of our brand Check out this position BALR is an international luxury lifestyle brand known for its highend fashion, travel products and accessories for men, women and kids As an Amsterdambased brand we have created a complete range of highquality items that inspire to live the life of a BALR Founded in 2013 by Demy de Zeeuw, Juul Manders and Ralph de Geus, BALR is the embodiment of a modern lifestyle brand Aspirational, focused and insync with its young and ambitious audience, we bring the luxurious lifestyle of extraordinary athletes within arms reach of everyone who works hard to live the dream, , The role, , As ERP Data Analyst at BALR youll support the processes of several departments of the company, like Finance, Ecommerce, Wholesale, Retail and Product Development In this role, youll be working as part of the IT team, streamlining the flow of information and data between several systems, with focus on the ERP, in our case, Oracle NetSuite, , You responsibilities, , Execute extraction, transformation, and load of data from and into the ERP system Identify and communicate efficient ways to collect, cleanse and maintain data between systems Develop and preconfigure templates to collect and import data into the ERP Developing, testing and deploying functional improvements in NetSuite Creating and optimizing reports and dashboards in order to service other users of the ERP Perform andor coordinate data validation, quality assurance QA, user interface UI verification activities related to the data flows Prepare andor update operating procedures and other documentation needed to support data migration activities Provide suggestions to streamline the extraction of data, and data transfer processes Work with project teams to find solutions to complex technical, managerial, or operational problems and evaluate options based on relevant information, resources Maintain and organize multiple excel spreadsheets to ensure data integrity Understand and support data standards and processes to support master data transfer Communicate data needs effectively and timely across departments and project teams, , , , Your profile, , At BALR we are looking for an analytical and proactive ERP Data Analyst With your data driven mindset and analytical skills youll act as an advisor for the business Its important you feel comfortable in a fast paced fashion and lifestyle environment Therefore, an interest in fashion and lifestyle product is a plus Bachelor degree At least 2 years of experience in a similar role Experienced in working with ERP solutions, Oracle Netsuite is a huge plus Advanced knowledge of Excel is a must, SQL is a plus Excellent Dutch and English communication skills, both verbally and in writing Interested in fashion and lifestyle products You are analytical, proactive, consistent and you have an eye for detail Available for a fulltime Amsterdam based position, , What we offer, , Competitive salary and attractive benefits An important and challenging role within a fast growing international lifestyle brand The opportunity to make real impact Plenty of room for your own initiatives and personal growth A dynamic and fun working environment with young and ambitious colleagues Lots of autonomy and responsibilities Daily lunch Are you up for the challenge

Job Title: Junior Model Validator – IRRBB & ALM models
Job Description: Model Validation is looking for an enthusiastic, curious Junior Model Validator who likes to develop himherself in the IRRBB validation chapter, , INGs global Model Validation IRRBB Interest Rate Risk in the Banking Book chapter is an energetic, diverse and collaborative international team consisting of about 15 highly qualified professionals of various quantitative backgrounds, located in Amsterdam, Following INGs Think Forward Strategy to become the next generation digital bank, data and models are considered key assets in our bank As model validators we safeguard the quality of INGs models, which are used for all kinds of decision making purposes We also contribute to the Model Risk Management revolution that is picking up worldwide, given that models are imperfect representations of reality and hence may lead to financial losses andor reputational damage To effectively achieve these challenges, our Model Validation teams have been substantially growing in size lately and will further grow, also internationally, , We are responsible for validating IRRBB  ALM Asset  Liability Management models used by ING in about 40 countries all over the globe We cover an interesting, wide and evolving model scope aimed to measure the impact of IRRBB on expected earnings and economic value as well as various ALM models used in balance sheet management These models vary from those having a technically advanced quantitative orientation to those displaying strong expert judgment in case of eg limited data availability Our core business consists of independently assessing whether a particular model is fit for the purpose it was designed for, based on the business context, academic theories, empirical evidence, regulations, best practices  technological innovations Effective challenge is key in our role Herewith we contribute to sound business practices, supporting a healthy, sustainable ING and global financial stability, , , As a model validator you focus on and further learn about the topics related to the models in your scope, using econometrics, quantitative finance, coding, business knowledge and related regulations You perform indepth analyses and write code to perform quantitative assessments You summarize your analyses and conclusions in clear, factbased and persuasively written reports, which are presented to the relevant Model Approval Committee You share your knowledge and effectively communicate with team members and a wide range of internal and external stakeholders You also have the opportunity to participate in the development of innovative, stateof theart validation frameworks and coding libraries, , , , , , , , Your prospective model scope is broad and are related to the following main areas, , , , , , , As part of the IRRBB chapter, you will contribute to further building and developing the team by sharing knowledge, coaching more junior staff and by embracing INGs Agile way of working, , , , We are looking for enthusiastic colleagues who enjoy performing quantitative analyses, writing  defending high quality validation reports, and have an intrinsic curiosity to continuously expand their knowledge, , In particular, as a member of our team, you have, , , , , , , Above all, you have a genuine passion to continuously improve yourself and our team As a model validator at ING, you will be empowered to have a true impact on INGs future model landscape Moreover, you will contribute to further implementing INGs innovative Think Forward strategy, , , , , , , , , At ING we offer you a 40 or 36 hour contract We care about an adequate worklife balance and we empower our colleagues to realize their ambitions Do your thing Our employment conditions are specified here

our clients with an easy and predictable experience Following the Think Forward strategy, we develop and facilitate in realising a differentiating customer and employee experience, , The CSS Tribe works with an ING WBwide scope In selfmanaging multidisciplinary teams squads together with other experts within INGs Agile organization you will work on a joint endtoend mission For around 60 of the time, the Chapter Lead works as a squad member towards achieving the squads purpose and reports to the tribe lead, , As a Chapter Lead you will share a collective responsibility with your peers to improve INGs performance and define and implement opportunities to better serve and delight customers You will have an eye on the long term perspective You will translate customer behaviour into business outcomes and ensure you provide guidance to the CSS Tribe on the client experience across the value chain You will proactively anticipate dependencies and collaborate across the WB Tribes as it relates to the client experience design across products, countries and channels Finally, together with the Tribe Lead and Central Product Owners, you give substance to the strategic direction of the Tribe Your input is crucial for determining the CSS Tribe purpose and objectives Together with this team you also provide an inspiring and attractive work environment and you support the squads maximally in living up to their purpose, , , , , , , , You are an inspiring, approachable candidate and pioneer of the crossborder culture, displaying the following behaviours

Job Title: Traineeship - Wholesale Banking April 2021 - WB Business school
Location: Hook of Holland, South Holland, Netherlands
Job Description: The world of banking is changing faster than ever, enjoy the best experience in our Wholesale Banking traineeship, , During our twoyear programme you create your own career within Wholesale Banking You learn more about your chosen discipline and the financial services sector Our trainee programme also allows you to discover yourself through a wide selection of online professional and personal skills trainings, , , , At ING we are always broadening our horizons Our people have a forwardthinking mentality, a strong cando spirit and enjoy working in an agile company, you will be responsible for following developments in the market and establishing a longterm relationship with our customers You therefore have a sense of enterprise and you know what is to our Wholesale Banking business, , , , Your trainee manager will assist you in choosing your first rotation which lasts approximately six months Based on your own interests, you can indicate your preferences for your first rotation so that we can work together to find a suitable starting role for you This enables you to get to know several departments within ING You will be involved in the daily activities of Wholesale Banking from day one You will be responsible for fulfilling a concrete assignment, such as working on the present customer portfolios together with the Relationship Manager or on a deal within Corporate Finance, , As a trainee you will also receive guidance from your line manager If you are looking for additional guidance you can ask a Senior Manager to mentor development, if possible with if possible with local Covid19 restrictions, , , , Besides being given the opportunity to put your talent to good use where it really matters, youll participate in a global training event with all trainees from your year, which will also enable you to quickly build up a large network, , There is more, to give you an idea, we will tell you about the other benefits of working at ING, , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , When applying for the Wholesale Banking traineeship April 2021, remember to upload your application CV, motivational questions and grade lists Bachelor and Master till now in English if you are sure you are what we are looking for, go for it, , The first interview round HR interview will be scheduled as soon as you pass the three part assessment, , The second interview round Business Panels will be held in the following weeks

Job Title: Specialist Transaction Monitoring Policy and Risk coverage - Amsterdam
Job Description: We are looking for an experienced financial crime professional with international experience in financial services You are a transaction Monitoring specialist, Subject Matter Expert SME and trusted advisor within the Financial Crime Compliance environment providing world class Transaction Monitoring for a Global Bank As a Senior SME TM Policy  Risk coverage you will be based in and report hierarchically and functionally to the Global lead of the Policy  Risk Coverage team, , , , , , , , The Global KYC organisation is part of INGs COO domain Its purpose is Enabling people and organisations to use our banking services by ensuring a compliant and competitive KYC ecosystem, , Our Global KYC organisation is a first line of defence department providing the ING business and functions with guidance, standardised solutions in the area of KYCrelated regulations as well as supporting realising operational excellence In our Global KYC organisation you will be working with many colleagues from different disciplines, geographies and backgrounds You will be part of managing and supporting the transformation towards this global organisation and as such contribute significantly to the realisation of the One Agile Way of Working methodology within ING, , The Global Transaction Monitoring TM organization TM Pillar is part of the Global KYC organization It sets standards and provides content expertise on the implementation of various KYCrelated laws  policies to the squads or circles, ensures the alignment with the other lines of defence and represents KYC and ING to internal  external parties incl regulators and client events The TM pillar, together with the local TM experts, plays a vital role in ensuring effective and efficient compliance with the KYCrelated regulations, more specific the AMLCTF legislation, , Within the TM Pillar, we have dedicated teams with indepth KYC knowledge and expertise one of the teams is the Policy  Risk Coverage team This team works closely with Compliance on our KYC Policy and is responsible for setting the requirements for transaction monitoring scenarios and controls for our global banking products and services, including reviewing country specific scenarios and controls It is our responsibility to monitor globally proper risk coverage and report hereon

Do you want to work at the leading European provider of Delivery Management Software Transsmart in Tilburg is growing fast and that is why we are looking for a Business Controller Do you want to join our fast growing travel, , Transsmart  is part of the Unifaun family leader in cloud transport management systems in the European market with offices in the Netherlands, Belgium, Sweden, Finland, Norway, Denmark and Poland The Unifaun group serves more than 100,000 customers worldwide and processes approximately 400 million packages through our systems each year, , Transsmart is paired with more than 400 post, package and LTLFTL carriers, offering more than 5,000 different carrier services We currently process more than 60 million pallets and packages each year Our customers are based in the Benelux, Germany and the UK They send packages with our software products all over the world We are looking for a strong Business Controller who is going to improve our finance department, , What are you going to do with us, , As a Business controller you will be crucial in taking the finance function to the next level and will function as a sparring partner to the Corporate Business Controller of Unifaun headquarters and the Transsmart Management team You will establish and develop a highquality controlling function and support the organisation with budgets, forecasts and business reviews Part of your role is to lead financial and business processes, perform monthly reporting to management, continuously improving controlling processes and support the organisation with implementation work after new acquisitions, , The challenge in this position is that we are a fast growing organization and you will support the Transsmart team and optimize our operational processes With your already built experience, you will determine the success of the further growth of our company In this role, business analysis skills with an eye for details, defining and implementing KPIs and reports, change management and process improvement skills are essential You like to work in an international, dynamic and evolving environment, , Your profile, , We are looking for a colleague who first enjoys moving in a developing, evolving market for wholesale, manufacturing, ecommerce and logistics services efulfilment companies, , You have an academic degree and 5 to 10 years relevant work experience as a business controller andor as a consultant within finance It is relevant that you have excellent skills in Excel, PowerPoint, ERPsoftware and BI tools To be successful in the role as a Business Controller at Transsmart you are analytical with an eye for details, proactive and enjoy working in a changing environment You take responsibility in preparing the budgets, forecasts and business reviews It is meriting if you have experience from auditing with large corporations andor in the field of mergers and acquisitions Fluency in English is required, both written and verbally, , You are by nature a spontaneous personality that communicates easily, have high analytical skills, a strong ability to structure and prioritize, are proactive and driven with a genuine interest in the business and have an ability to build relationships and trust A healthy portion of perseverance with a sense of humor is appreciated by everyone, , Because the pace is high, we assume that you feel at ease in a dynamic environment and that you use your personality to make finance alive within Transsmart, , What do we offer you, , A young, informal, professional and dynamic organization in which you get a lot of freedom and where your own initiative is expected and appreciated Of course, your work will be rewarded with an excellent marketbased salary package, , Got excited, , Have you gotten excited We would like to have a cup of coffee with you You can apply below In addition to your CV, we appreciate a short and concise letter of motivation, , Do you have any questions beforehand We would like to tell you more about the function and the organization Transsmart Feel free to contact Jeroen Evers General Manager via 088 , , Acquisitie naar aanleiding van deze vacature wordt niet op prijs gesteld

1122020 INTERIM AANVRAAG URGENT PROJECTLEIDER SAP RETAIL, , Dringen op zoek naar een PROJECTLEIDER SAP RETAIL met aantoonbare projectmanagement ervaring in een leidinggevende rol, , Het betreft het samenvoegen van 2 bedrijven binnen RETAIL De SAP kennis is reeds in house, het team bestaat uit kern van 5 en per discipline of probleemgebied wordt een nieuwe externe binnengehaald, , , Er wordt gewerkt met SAP RETAIL bij beide spelers, echter zijn de systemen niet uniform ingericht Voorbeeld Voorraad intern en extern staan door elkaar onder de retail noemer dit zou gesplitst moeten zijn in een RETAIL kant en een interne WHOLESALE klant voor bevoorrading van eigen winkels Zo zijn er tal van deeluitdagingen Organisatorisch is staat SAP klaar en moeten er enkel de deeltrajecten nog opgelost worden, , , We zoeken een interim project manager bij voorkeur met retail ervaring, de aansturende projecten kant is belangrijker dan SAP retail kennis, maar het helpt wel als je er mee gewerkt hebt verder ben je met name pragmatisch, overview, analytisch, sensitief, stakeholdermanagement en een doorpakker en je spreekt de Nederlandstalige taal vloeiend Bij start ga je gesprekken aan, bepaalt de scope van het project en stel je een heldere projectplanning op waar iedereen zich aan houdt, , , , , , Voor vragen  Pascal 0641061832  pascaldlivrnl

Job Title: Global KYC CDD Sr. Operations Specialist - Amsterdam
Job Description: As Global KYC CDD Sr Operations Specialist you will be based in Amsterdam, Warsaw, Bratislava or Manila preferable but other locations can be discussed You will report into the Expert Lead CDD Operations in Adam, , , , , , , , , , The Global KYC organisation is a new organisation within the COO domain Its purpose is Enabling people and organisations to use our banking services by ensuring a compliant and competitive KYC ecosystem Bringing all KYC related capabilities into one functionally steered organisation will support the standardisation of related processes, enhanced controls, shared tooling and the optimisation of operations across all of the business lines, helping us to achieve a more robust KYC environment that will strongly contribute to INGs overall response towards more stringent regulatory requirements in this area and beyond, The Global KYC organisation is a first line of defence department providing the ING business and functions with guidance, standardised solutions in the area of KYCrelated regulations as well as supporting realising operational excellence In the Global KYC organisation you will be working with many colleagues from different disciplines, geographies and backgrounds You will be part of managing and supporting the transformation towards this global organisation and as such contribute significantly to the realisation of the One Agile Way of Working methodology within ING, , If you want to work at the cutting edge of whats possible, surrounded by progressive, inspiring and supportive colleagues, there is no better place to invest your talents than at ING Join us Apply today

Offer, , an amazing opportunity to use your skills and experience by helping out this client, , , , , The organisation is an international pharmaceutical organisation that has been operating in at least forty countries across Europe, the Middle East and Africa They operate on a global level and most teams have a global focus They have everything in house like research, development, manufacturing, warehousing but also sales and marketing It is their hope to change tomorrows world and to improve the lives of individuals by providing innovative medicines in areas of health, where there is an urgent need for better treatments The organisation is clearly focused on bringing highquality medicines to the market to reach their goals Wouldnt it be lovely to join them in their journey At this moment they are open to meet an enthusiastic candidate for a temporary position as Quality Assurance Specialist at their office in Leiden, , , , As a Quality Assurance Specialist you will maintain the Quality Management System by implementation and continual improvement of QM systems You will adjust procedures and processes like handling of deviations, complaints and CAPAs You will be following GMPGDP regulated changes or escalations of potential significant quality issues You are going to ensure that deviations and complaints, as identified at the affiliate are raised in TrackWise Therefore you lead appropriate investigations, and CAPA plans are developed where appropriate You ensure that deviations, complaints, CAPAs and change control actions are progressed in a timely manner Next to this, you maintain the training system for all personnel involved in wholesale andor MAH activities, and perform training of the relevant Quality Management Systems Furthermore, you are going to perform local checks following receipts of certified medicinal products according to a documented process and execute the local Release for Distribution for products in accordance with local regulations and guidelines The team is located in Leiden and you will report to the manager of the department

Postbank Groep De nieuwe naam InternationaleNederlanden Groep werd al snel ingekort tot ING, waarna deonderneming besloot om haar statutaire naam te veranderenin ING Groep NV, , Wat is kenmerkend voor hetwerken bij de ING, , , , Met je team bepaal je elke dag opnieuw welkewerkzaamheden aan het einde van de dag afgerond moeten zijn wegaan niet eerder naar huis dan dat het afgesproken werk klaar isBovendien spreek je met elkaar af wie die dag precies wat gaatdoen De taakverdeling kan elke dag verschillen Het gaat erom dathet werk goed en op tijd gedaan wordt Soms zal het werkaanbodgedurende de dag afwijken van wat we hadden ingeschat Weverwachten dan dat je hier met je team goed op inspeelt, Deze manier van werken betekent dat je binnen een dag op hetene moment vooral telefonisch contact hebt met klanten en dat jehet andere moment vooral bezig bent om klantverzoeken netjes insystemen te verwerken of een klantverzoek beoordeelt Dit maakt jewerk enorm afwisselend, , , , ING is looking for professionals, for the period of 1year, to perform historical default data collection, data analysisand data enhancement for the wholesale banking Large CorporateNPLportfolio, in line with latest internal and external regulationrelated to PD and LGD model estimation, , Thecandidate will be working in project team environment with highlyexperienced professionals and conducts in depth analysis on NPLsKnowledge in both front office banking processes as well as therestructuring and refinancing processes is a must, , Given the complexity of the Large Corporateportfolio, candidates should have indepth understanding ofwholesale banking in terms of front office, restructuring andrecoveryprocesses They should have experience with working withNPLs and have affinity with risk data and associated PD, LGD andEAD models, , , , We are looking forexperienced and proactive HBO or WO candidates with extensivebackground  5 yrs relevant work experience in wholesalebanking lending, credit risk, credit restructuring and refinancingprocesses Experienced with cashflow remediation, good writing andoral communication skills are a must primarily Dutch andEnglish, The candidate has critical and analyticalmind, willing to get the job done and, familiar inworking in highstress projectbasedenvironment, , , , , , , It is afulltime 36 hrs pw job If this must be your next job, pressthe apply  button to take the next step in your professionalcareer

Job Title: Business Analyst for Regulatory Reporting - Amsterdam
Job Description: Work environment, , The COO Risk  Finance department delivers Risk  Finance related services to its stakeholders, ie Group Finance, country CFOs and Wholesale Banking, Risk, Tax and Bank Treasury These services encompass operations and change initiatives for accounting, reporting, data foundation and business advice services, including system, process, data and information management, and analytics capabilities By design, the services are reliable, secure and in control Change is delivered in accordance with the Finance strategy and implementation and decommissioning roadmap The Tribe Statutory and Regulatory Reporting delivers and enables the organisation to provide ontime, highquality, standardized financial reporting solutions, in compliance with external and internal regulations As a BA, you work in a squad with around 79 colleagues covering the whole range of expertise in the squad Together, you work on a common purpose You like to work in a constructive way in a multidisciplinary squad Together with your squad members you do everything within your power to realise your common mission day by day The BA reports to the Chapter Lead The BA can fulfil the role of Product Owner within a squad, determining the priorities for the squad, , Profile description, , We are looking for an energetic and driven expert with strong analytical capabilities who uses stateoftheart methods and techniques for business analysis You have integral, domainexceeding knowledge of Finance You are an excellent communicator and able to build bridges between different stakeholders You are able to convincingly put forward your proposals and are a real team player in reaching broad agreement on the road to follow In this way, you can contribute to delivering standardised, uniform and fully adapted solutions to complex Finance issues and processes, , You analyse complex Finance business issues that go beyond squad andor tribe boundaries, with a view to designing complete solutions for the requested change You deliver excellently substantiated analyses using stateoftheart techniques and tools, which lead to functional designs that cover all change deliverables You are focused on process design and the translation to IT You ensure that all requirements of all relevant stakeholders are acknowledged in the analyses and the different solution designs You support tribes and squads in their decisionmaking by presenting the different functional and solution design alternatives and their impact in a clear way You guarantee that the business requirements and nonfunctional requirements are translated into IT Solution requirements You work together with IT architects and specialists to come up with a suitable IT solution, , In doing so, you conduct a number of coherent analyses, , Requirements analysis, , You elicit sets of coherent requirements You make sure that the requirements are complete, consistent, of good quality, that they are translated correctly in the design, and that they are maintained and, if necessary, adjusted if changes occur You support the product owners and the squads in managing the backlog by translating and prioritising the epics into features and, together with the squad, into user stories, , Process analysis, , You analyse the current situation, the problems that occur and the underlying causes Based on this analysis, you provide clear process designs, , Information analysis, , You analyse the necessary input, output, and adjustment of data in the client processes You analyse the information need You investigate the quality of the captured data and come up with solutions to improve quality, , Risk analysis, , You are able to translate the policy and regulation of ORM, Compliance and Legal into design solutions, , , , University BachelorsMasters degree in business economics or Accounting or a comparable field At least 5 years of experience as a BA with implementing and designing functional solutions in a financial institution Experience with Regulatory reporting preferably COREP including Leverage Ratio and Large Exposure Experience in interpretation and implementation of Regulatory Requirements , , Experience with Change delivery intake, impact analysis, testing Experience with Agile Excellent communication skills, written communication and power to convince Ability to work under tight deadlines Ability to coordinate across TribesDepartments Very strong team player proactive, ability to connect, positive mindset, flexibility, focused on cooperation and sharing knowledge Fluent in English, , , , Experience in the role of Product Owner and work with the Product Backlog Negotiation Skills Communication and presentation skills, , , , Interpret and implement regulatory requirements Requirement gathering and elicitation Support the Development Team with analysis and explanation of Regulatory Requirements Stakeholder management Policy and Procedure, Group  Local Finance, Delivery Parties Support  execute testing Provide support for quarterly production runs, , What we offer, , A job for 36 hours and a unique offer that fits in with the times of today We take into account your home situation and your ambitions and help you to balance work and private life Discover yourself our employment, , To give you an idea, we will tell you about the benefits of working at ING A salary tailored to your qualities and experience Flexible working hours and the possibility to work at home A reimbursement for travel expenses 24 vacation days with a 36hour working week Pension scheme 13th month salary Individual Savings Contribution BIS, 35 of your gross annual salary 8 Holiday payment Personal growth and challenging work with endless possibilities to realize Enabling people and organisations to use our banking services by ensuring a compliant and competitive KYC ecosystem, , Our Global KYC organisation is a first line of defence department providing the ING business and functions with guidance, standardised solutions in the area of KYCrelated regulations as well as supporting realising operational excellence In our Global KYC organisation you will be working with many colleagues from different disciplines, geographies and backgrounds You will be part of managing and supporting the transformation towards this global organisation and as such Job Title: Senior/Principal Model Validation Lead - IRRBB & ALM models - Amsterdam
Job Description: Model Validation is looking for an enthusiastic SeniorPrincipal Validation Lead, who enjoys being an expert leader in the IRRBB validation chapter, , INGs global Model Validation IRRBB Interest Rate Risk in the Banking Book chapter is an energetic, diverse and collaborative international team consisting of about 15 highly qualified professionals of various quantitative backgrounds, located in Amsterdam, , Following INGs Think Forward Strategy to become the next generation digital bank, data and models are considered key assets in our bank As model validators we safeguard the quality of INGs models, which are used for all kinds of decision making purposes We also contribute to the Model Risk Management revolution that is picking up worldwide, given that models are imperfect representations of reality and hence may lead to financial losses andor reputational damage To effectively achieve these challenges, our Model Validation teams have been substantially growing in size lately and will further grow, also internationally, , We are responsible for validating IRRBB and ALM Asset  Liability Management models used by ING, in about 40 countries all over the globe We cover an interesting, wide and evolving model scope aimed to measure the impact of IRRBB on expected earnings and economic value, as well as various ALM models used in balance sheet management These models vary from those having a technically advanced quantitative orientation to those displaying strong expert judgment in case of eg limited data availability Our core business consists of independently assessing whether a particular model is fit for the purpose it was designed for, based on the business context, academic theories, empirical evidence, regulations, best practices  technological innovations Effective challenge is key in our role Herewith we contribute to sound business practices, supporting a healthy, sustainable ING and global financial stability, , , , As a SeniorPrincipal Validation Lead you focus on and specialize in the content and are the goto expert for the topics related to the models in your scope, including econometrics, quantitative finance, coding, business knowledge and related regulations You are fully aware of internal and external developments and understand the bigger picture and relation to other topics Besides performing validations, you proactively share your knowledge with others, supporting their further development You also play a key role in the development of innovative, stateof theart validation frameworks and coding libraries, , , , You are seen and recognized as an expert leader in your field of expertise You advise on strategic level and are a driving force in defining which trends and innovations are relevant for INGs model validationmodel risk management activities Youll work closely with the Chapter Lead and Product Owner Together you ensure that the work is effectively allocated within the squad Together with the Chapter Lead andor Product Owner, you determine a projects overall duration which the validators subsequently refine into milestones, , Together with the Chapter Lead and Product Owner, you contribute to the further design of the tribes vision  strategy and drive the execution, , Your prospective model scope is broad and are related to the following main areas, , As part of the IRRBB chapter, you contribute to further building and developing the team by sharing knowledge, coaching more junior colleagues and by embracing INGs Agile way of working, , , , We are looking for enthusiastic, communicative colleagues who have an intrinsic curiosity to continuously expand  share their knowledge base and the drive to become a senior expert within the chapter You are an important reference point whenever strategic content expertise is required By sharing your indepth expertise you help other colleagues to continuously improve themselves You are a team player with a proactive attitude You are an advocate of the ING Orange Code, a naturally collaborative person who listens to and invests in others to achieve common goals You are transparent, embrace the ING One Way of Working and enjoy coachingteaching others on content related matters, , , , To take on the SeniorPrincipal Validation Lead role, you bring in senior expert knowledge, highly advanced quantitative validation methods and techniques, and the ability to think at a strategic level, , Above all, you have a genuine passion for continuously improving yourself and our team As a SeniorPrincipal Validation Lead at ING, you will be empowered to have a true impact on INGs future model landscape Moreover, you will have the opportunity to contribute to further implementing INGs innovative Think Forward strategy, , You are prepared to travel occasionally Your main base is Amsterdam, , , , , , At ING we offer you a 40 or 36 hour contract We care about an adequate worklife balance and we empower our colleagues to realize their ambitions Do your thing Our employment conditions are specified here In particular, we offer

Job Title: NFR Officer WB Advanced Analytics - Amsterdam
Job Description: ING is looking for a passionate NFR Risk officer with a focus on IT Risk, , Think Forward Our purpose is to empower people to stay a step ahead in life and in business We are an industry recognized strong brand with positive recognition from customers in many countries, strong financial position, omnichannel distribution strategy and international network If you want to work at a place with lots of freedom to innovate, where we believe that you can live by the Agile manifesto without jeopardizing the necessary continuity, compliance and QA measures, where we are committed to deliver stable and secure services to end users, and where we have a no nonsense gettingthings done mentality, please read on, , As a you will make sure that the teams working within Wholesale Banking Advanced Analytics WBAA address risks in the right way, at the right time Your main interest and expertise lies with IT Risk including addressing the threats and vulnerabilities that come with using or developing technologies and finding new ways to adhere to INGs IT risk and control compliance requirements You are eager to build your IT risk knowledge working together with a team of experienced risk professionals as well as skilled data engineers and data scientists, , You want to promote a risk culture and work on improving the way in which WBAA addresses risks This includes finding ways to scale yourself so teams can work as independently as possible on their IT risk related tasks You have a critical mind, can take other risk areas into consideration and are able to engage with and add value to the wider risk community by your innovative approach, , You will be part of a small team squad of 1st line NFR professionals and enjoy a creative atmosphere where trying things out is encouraged, , , , As a NFR officer your first priority is to make sure  IT risks are managed appropriately by the teams in WBAA This happens by following the development phases of initiatives and addressing key risks for each phase You are sensitive towards the creative process and growth of new solutions You are also a key contact between the project and 2nd line For projects you make sure teams are aware, grow in risk maturity and deliver on their risks with the right prioritization For secondline you make sure the right persons are engaged in the project reviews and actively support and lead discussions on risk solutions, risk acceptances or policy waivers You make the teams risk journey as frictionless as possible, , You also focus on the bigger picture can I build tools to make the IT risk processes more efficient for the projects Or does existing guidance have to change in order for our teams to function You speak your mind and become a thought leader within the bank on IT risk related topics You want to have an impact beyond the operational daytoday tasks, , Thats why you wake up to go to work On Monday morning, you have a meeting with your NFR squad in which you share your priorities for the week and reflect on the tasks of the previous week Luckily, your colleagues are always ready to provide answers to your questions or step into a meeting with you to help out After this squad meeting, you set out to review an IT risk acceptance drafted by a WBAA project After making a few changes, you send it back to the teams Product Owner to share with our IRM 2nd line contact You make a note to update the WBAA Confluence page with an example of this risk acceptance, as you believe more teams would benefit from the guidance You then have a meeting on a RiskControl SelfAssessment of another project, where you share a template of the RCSA and discuss the approach for completing the document with the team After lunch, you review a document drafted by one of your risk colleagues on the US Nexus The document serves to inform the Tribes management of the impact of this topic on their strategy around public clouds You talk to an experienced data and security engineer about their experiences with encryption and key management in Azure and add their input to the document Their knowledge and skills saved you some time on reading up on this yourself, the benefit of working with highly skilled professionals You also include your own vision in the document, because you know management is interested in your opinion about this and other topics, , , , The Wholesale Banking Advanced Analytics team is a team of 100 people that has the mission to make Wholesale Banking in ING data driven We do this by combining Big Data technology with Data Science to deliver high value solutions and products for our organization We work in a fun and creative environment and were dedicated to bringing out the best in both each other and our projects Youll be part of the NonFinancial Risk NFR squad within WBAA, which is without a doubt the best part, , , , Search no further If you answered all of the previous with yes, you want to work at Wholesale Banking Advanced Analytics Your job will focus not only on the daytoday questions on IT risk and other NFR topics, but also on the data and analytics strategy of Wholesale Bank from an NFR perspective This means you will work operationally on addressing the risks encountered by the WBAA teams, as well as strategically to improve and innovate the way in which the Wholesale Bank and WBAA deal with risk, , , , Our preferred candidate has a Masters degree in an area related to IT however, practical experience makes up for the lack of a formal degree related to IT You also have a working understanding of software development and basic understanding of commonly used technologies in the field Agile development experience is a nice to have You have one to four years of proven, relevant experience within the risk function of a commercial organization and indepth knowledge of risk frameworks and areas such IT management, IT governance, IT security, operational risk and compliance You can express yourself both in writing and verbally in English and preferably in Dutch You have experience in building and maintaining relations with other departments in a complex environment, are collaborative by nature and take things on in a proactive and open minded manner, , , , , , Working at ING means working in a dynamic and international setting Individual development of our employees is very important and that is why ING offers excellent courses and programs You will become a member of the Wholesale Banking Advanced Analytics team, a prestigious, nononsense and highoutput datascience team Diva behavior is not tolerated, neither is underperformance We only hire people with exceptional talents and capabilities You will work on the most innovative projects within ING

Job Title: Vacature - Opleiding Telecom monteur KPN - Gouda
Job Description: Je start de dag rustig op met een power ontbijt en een bak koffie Je start je tablet op, waarop je eerste bon verschijnt Om 0800 uur s ochtends word je verwacht bij je eerste klant Met je werkauto rij je naar de klant, je stelt je voor als visitekaartje van KPN en voert de desbetreffende opdracht uit, , Als telecom monteur is geen dag hetzelfde Naast dat je de verschillende pakketten van KPN bij de klant aansluit en installeert, los je ook storingen op aan bestaande installaties bij de klant thuis, maar soms ook in de centrales KPN, Als KPN monteur ben je pas tevreden wanneer je je werk technisch goed hebt uitgevoerd en de klant tevreden achterlaat op het moment dat je de deur uitstapt Als ambassadeur van KPN adviseer je klanten over de producten en diensten van KPN en signaleer je verkoop kansen, , Ben je technisch onderlegd, kan je zowel zelfstandig als in teamverband werken en krijg jij energie om klanten tevreden en met een glimlach achter te laten Werk je graag voor marktleider KPN als fulltime Telecom monteur en word je enthousiast van de bovenstaande werkzaamheden Lees dan gauw verder, , Aantoonbare interesse in de telecom is een must, ervaring niet per se Technisch inzicht heb je of heb je niet Vak gerelateerde kennis is bij te leren Met twee rechterhanden, maar zonder technische werkervaring of opleiding, kom je in aanmerking voor deze functie In een periode van 8 weken word je in een intensief opleidingstraject klaargestoomd tot Telecom monteur, waarbij je diverse certificaten gaat behalen Daarnaast loop je mee met een ervaren monteur om de fijne kneepjes van het vak in de praktijk te leren, , Bekijk via onderstaande link een filmpje van een KPN monteur, zo krijg je een goede indruk httpsyoutube86QvjKRwtNc, , , Werken bij KPN garandeert jou een gevarieerde werkdag, elke dag opnieuw Pas jij in het functieprofiel van Telecom monteur, dan zorgen wij er samen met KPN voor dat je wordt opgeleid Vanaf dag n ontvang je salaris volgens de KPN CAO bruto uurloon 1313  2050 pmnd obv 36 urige werkweek  4,30 koffiegeld per dag, , Tijdens het opleidingstraject volg je diverse trainingen Zo wordt er de ene dag ingezoomd op gesprekstechnieken en leer je volgens KPN normen te communiceren met de klant De andere dag ga je in op het technische aspect van het werk Tijdens dit traject behaal je verschillende certificaten, denk hierbij aan HVD, KVD, NEN3140, VCA Uiteraard is dit een beknopte weergave van het gehele opleidingstraject, , , , Het betreft een fulltime functie, vast werk voor een lange tijd De intentie is om een jarenlang dienstverband met elkaar aan te gaan Bij goed functioneren kans op overname door KPN, Heb je vragen Bel gerust voor meer informatie naar 0528280400 We staan je graag te woord, , Vaardigheden, , Ben jij die probleemoplosser binnen je vrienden of familiekring met betrekking tot het internet, televisie en computers Ben jij goed in de omgang met mensen en kan je je kennis duidelijk overbrengen om klanten gedegen te informeren, , , , Je bent woonachtig in of in de directe omgeving van, , , Over de werkgever, , Voor deze vacature werken wij, Technicum, samen met onze opdrachtgever KPN KPN is leverancier van telecommunicatie en ICTdiensten en biedt consumenten vaste en mobiele telefonie, internet en televisie Voor zakelijke klanten verzorgt KPN complete
